trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates red and green pens.
trans-unit.target: 建立紅色和綠色的畫筆。

trans-unit.source: Creates seven points to define the curve.
trans-unit.target: 會建立七個點來定義曲線。

trans-unit.source: Draws six red straight lines between the seven points to form an incomplete polygon.
trans-unit.target: 若要不完整的多邊形七個點之間繪製六個紅色的直線。

trans-unit.source: Creates a tension setting.
trans-unit.target: 建立張力設定。

trans-unit.source: Draws an open green closed curve through the seven points.
trans-unit.target: 繪製穿過七個點的開啟綠色封閉的曲線。

trans-unit.source: The method uses a tension of 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 此方法會使用 1.0 的張力。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pen" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pen" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="points" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="points" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that determines the color, width, and style of the curve.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，決定曲線的色彩、寬度和樣式。

trans-unit.source: Array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures that define the spline.
trans-unit.target: 定義曲線的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 結構陣列。

trans-unit.source: Offset from the first element in the array of the <c>points</c> parameter to the starting point in the curve.
trans-unit.target: 從 <c>points</c> 參數陣列第一個項目到曲線開始點的位移。

trans-unit.source: Number of segments after the starting point to include in the curve.
trans-unit.target: 要在曲線中包括的開始點後的線段數目。

trans-unit.source: Draws a cardinal spline through a specified array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: 繪製穿過指定陣列的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 結構的基本曲線。

trans-unit.source: The drawing begins offset from the beginning of the array.
trans-unit.target: 會從陣列開頭位移開始繪製。

trans-unit.source: This method draws a cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製在通過陣列中每個點的基本曲線。

trans-unit.source: The array of points must contain at least three <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structures for a curve to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 點陣列必須包含至少三個<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>曲線要繪製的結構。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `offset` parameter specifies the number of elements to skip in the array.
trans-unit.target: 值`offset`參數指定要在陣列中略過的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The first element after the skipped elements represents the starting point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 已略過的項目之後的第一個項目代表曲線開始點。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `numberOfSegments` parameter specifies the number of segments, after the starting point, to draw in the curve.
trans-unit.target: 值`numberOfSegments`參數之後的起點，若要在曲線中繪製指定的區段數目。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `numberOfSegments` parameter must be at least 1.
trans-unit.target: 值`numberOfSegments`參數必須至少為 1。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `offset` parameter plus the value of the `numberOfSegments` parameter must be less than the number of elements in the array of the `points` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 值`offset`參數加上值`numberOfSegments`參數必須是少於陣列中的項目數目`points`參數。

trans-unit.source: This method uses a default tension of 0.5.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用預設張力為 0.5。

trans-unit.target: 值`numberOfSegments`參數之後的起點，若要在曲線中繪製指定的區段數目。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `numberOfSegments` parameter must be at least 1.

trans-unit.source: The `tension` parameter determines the shape of the spline.
trans-unit.target: `tension`參數會決定曲線的形狀。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the `tension` parameter is 0.0F, this method draws straight line segments to connect the points.
trans-unit.target: 如果值`tension`參數是 0.0，這個方法會繪製的直線線段連接的點。

trans-unit.source: Values over 1.0F produce unusual results.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that specifies the location and size of the resulting image on the display surface.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 結構，指定在顯示介面上產生影像的位置和大小。

trans-unit.source: The image contained in the <c>icon</c> parameter is scaled to the dimensions of this rectangular area.
trans-unit.target: 包含在 <c>icon</c> 參數中的影像會縮放為這個矩形區域的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: Draws the image represented by the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> within the area specified by a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 結構指定的區域中，繪製由指定之 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> 表示的影像。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an icon from a standard Windows icon file SampIcon.ico in the example folder.
trans-unit.target: 從標準的 Windows 圖示檔 SampIcon.ico 範例資料夾中建立的圖示。

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle in which to draw the icon.
trans-unit.target: 建立在其中繪製圖示的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Draws the icon to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 繪製至畫面的圖示。

trans-unit.source: The position of the rectangle locates the icon on the screen, and the size of the rectangle determines the scaling of the drawn icon.
trans-unit.target: 矩形的位置找出圖示在畫面上，並繪製圖示的縮放比例的矩形的大小決定。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="icon" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="icon" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" />。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 繪製影像左上角的 X 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 所繪製影像左上角的 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: Draws the image represented by the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的座標處，繪製由指定之 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> 所表示的影像。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an icon from a standard Windows icon file SampIcon.ico in the example folder.
trans-unit.target: 從標準的 Windows 圖示檔 SampIcon.ico 範例資料夾中建立的圖示。

trans-unit.source: Creates the coordinates of the upper-left corner at which to draw the icon.
trans-unit.target: 建立要繪製圖示左上角的座標。

trans-unit.source: Draws the icon to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 繪製至畫面的圖示。

trans-unit.source: The drawn icon is unscaled.
trans-unit.target: 繪製的圖示是未縮放。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="icon" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="icon" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that specifies the location and size of the resulting image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 結構，指定產生影像的位置和大小。

trans-unit.source: The image is not scaled to fit this rectangle, but retains its original size.
trans-unit.target: 影像不會縮放以符合這個矩形，而是保留它的原始大小。

trans-unit.source: If the image is larger than the rectangle, it is clipped to fit inside it.
trans-unit.target: 如果影像比矩形大，則它會裁剪以適合置入此矩形。

trans-unit.source: Draws the image represented by the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> without scaling the image.
trans-unit.target: 繪製由指定之 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> 表示的影像，但不縮放影像。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an icon from a standard Windows icon file SampIcon.ico in the example folder.
trans-unit.target: 從標準的 Windows 圖示檔 SampIcon.ico 範例資料夾中建立的圖示。

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle in which to draw the icon.
trans-unit.target: 建立在其中繪製圖示的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Draws the icon to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 繪製至畫面的圖示。

trans-unit.source: The position of the rectangle locates the icon on the screen, and the drawn icon is unscaled and unclipped.
trans-unit.target: 矩形的位置圖示會放置在畫面上，並繪製的圖示是縮放且未裁剪。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="icon" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="icon" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> at the specified location and with the original size.
trans-unit.target: 以原始大小，在指定之位置繪製指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structure that represents the location of the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 結構，指定繪製影像的左上角位置。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />, using its original physical size, at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 使用原始的實體大小，在指定位置繪製指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Image>儲存值，以像素寬度和水平解析度 （每英吋點數） 的值。

trans-unit.source: The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution.
trans-unit.target: 實體的寬度，以英吋，映像的單位是像素寬度除以水平解析度。

trans-unit.source: For example, an image with a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 3 inches.
trans-unit.target: 例如，216 像素寬度和水平解析度每 72 英吋的映像有實體 3 英吋的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height.
trans-unit.target: 類似的備註適用於像素高度和實體的高度。

trans-unit.source: This method draws an image using its physical size, so the image will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製影像使用的實體大小，讓映像將會擁有正確的大小是以英吋，不論顯示裝置的解析度 （每英吋點數）。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose an image has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設映像有 216 像素寬度和水平解析度 72 每英吋的點數。

trans-unit.source: If you call this method to draw that image on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image will be (216/72)*96 = 288.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫此方法以繪製該映像的裝置解析度為 96 dpi 上時，所呈現影像的像素寬度會 (216/72) * 96 = 288。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.
trans-unit.target: 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立的映像。

trans-unit.source: Creates a point at which to draw the upper-left corner of the image.
trans-unit.target: 建立要繪製影像的左上角的點。

trans-unit.source: Draws the unscaled image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 無縮放的影像繪製至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of three <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures that define a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 定義平行四邊形之三個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 結構的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> at the specified location and with the specified shape and size.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的形狀和大小，在指定之位置繪製指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: `destPoints`參數會指定三個平行四邊形的點。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 三個<xref:System.Drawing.Point>結構代表平行四邊形左上角、 右上角和左下角。

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: The image represented by the `image` parameter is scaled and sheared to fit the shape of the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 所表示的影像`image`參數可調整且修剪來符合所指定的平行四邊形的圖形`destPoints`參數。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.
trans-unit.target: 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立的映像。

trans-unit.source: Creates points that define a parallelogram in which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: 建立定義要在其中繪製影像的平行四邊形的點。

trans-unit.source: Draws the image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 將影像繪製至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: The position of the parallelogram locates the image on the screen, and the size of the original image and the size and shape of the parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 平行四邊形的位置影像的畫面上，以及原始映像大小和大小與形狀的平行四邊形決定調整和修剪繪製影像。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure that represents the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 結構，表示繪製影像的左上角。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />, using its original physical size, at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 使用原始的實體大小，在指定位置繪製指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Image>儲存值，以像素寬度和水平解析度 （每英吋點數） 的值。

trans-unit.source: The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution.
trans-unit.target: 實體的寬度，以英吋，映像的單位是像素寬度除以水平解析度。

trans-unit.source: For example, an image with a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 3 inches.
trans-unit.target: 例如，216 像素寬度和水平解析度每 72 英吋的映像有實體 3 英吋的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height.
trans-unit.target: 類似的備註適用於像素高度和實體的高度。

trans-unit.source: This method draws an image using its physical size, so the image will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製影像使用的實體大小，讓映像將會擁有正確的大小是以英吋，不論顯示裝置的解析度 （每英吋點數）。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose an image has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設映像有 216 像素寬度和水平解析度 72 每英吋的點數。

trans-unit.source: If you call this method to draw that image on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image will be (216/72)*96 = 288.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫此方法以繪製該映像的裝置解析度為 96 dpi 上時，所呈現影像的像素寬度會 (216/72) * 96 = 288。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.
trans-unit.target: 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立的映像。

trans-unit.source: Creates a point at which to draw the upper-left corner of the image.
trans-unit.target: 建立要繪製影像的左上角的點。

trans-unit.source: Draws the unscaled image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 無縮放的影像繪製至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of three <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures that define a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 定義平行四邊形之三個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 結構的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> at the specified location and with the specified shape and size.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的形狀和大小，在指定之位置繪製指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: `destPoints`參數會指定三個平行四邊形的點。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 三個<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>結構代表平行四邊形左上角、 右上角和左下角。

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: The image represented by the `image` object is scaled and sheared to fit the shape of the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 所表示的影像`image`物件是調整及修剪來符合所指定的平行四邊形的圖形`destPoints`參數。

trans-unit.target: 要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that specifies the location and size of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 結構，指定繪製影像的位置和大小。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> at the specified location and with the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的大小，在指定的位置繪製指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The image represented by the `image` object is scaled to the dimensions of the `rect` rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 所表示的影像`image`物件會調整的尺寸為`rect`矩形。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Image>儲存值，以像素寬度和水平解析度 （每英吋點數） 的值。

trans-unit.source: The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution.
trans-unit.target: 實體的寬度，以英吋，映像的單位是像素寬度除以水平解析度。

trans-unit.source: For example, an image with a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 3 inches.
trans-unit.target: 例如，216 像素寬度和水平解析度每 72 英吋的映像有實體 3 英吋的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height.
trans-unit.target: 類似的備註適用於像素高度和實體的高度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method draws an image using its physical size, so the image will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法繪製影像使用的實體大小，讓映像將會擁有正確的大小是以英吋，不論顯示裝置的解析度 （每英吋點數）。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose an image has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch.

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> to draw that image on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image will be (216/72)*96 = 288.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of three <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures that define a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 定義平行四邊形之三個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 結構的陣列。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure that specifies the portion of the <c>image</c> object to draw.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 結構，指定 <c>image</c> 物件要繪製的部分。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> enumeration that specifies the units of measure used by the <c>srcRect</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 列舉的成員，指定 <c>srcRect</c> 參數所使用的測量單位。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified portion of the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> at the specified location and with the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的大小，在指定的位置繪製所指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 之指定部分。

trans-unit.source: The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: `destPoints`參數會指定三個平行四邊形的點。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 三個<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>結構代表平行四邊形左上角、 右上角和左下角。

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: The `srcRect` parameter specifies a rectangular portion of the `image` object to draw.
trans-unit.target: `srcRect`參數指定的矩形部分`image`繪製的物件。

trans-unit.source: This portion is scaled and sheared to fit inside the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個部分會調整及修剪來配合所指定的平行四邊形`destPoints`參數。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.
trans-unit.target: 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立的映像。

trans-unit.source: Creates points that define a destination parallelogram in which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: 建立定義要在其中繪製影像的目的地平行四邊形的點。

trans-unit.source: Creates a source rectangle from which to extract a portion of the image.
trans-unit.target: 建立來源矩形要從中擷取映像的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Sets the unit of measure of the source rectangle to pixels.
trans-unit.target: 設定來源矩形的測量的單位為像素。

trans-unit.source: Draws the image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 將影像繪製至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: The position of the destination parallelogram locates the image on the screen, the size of the source rectangle and the size and shape of the destination parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image, and the size of the rectangle determines what portion of the original image is drawn to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 映像會放置在螢幕上的目的地平行四邊形的位置，來源矩形和大小的大小和形狀目的平行四邊形判斷的縮放和修剪繪製影像，並決定矩形的大小原始的映像的哪些部分會繪製到螢幕。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that specifies the location and size of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 結構，指定繪製影像的位置和大小。

trans-unit.source: The image is scaled to fit the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 縮放影像來符合矩形。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that specifies the portion of the <c>image</c> object to draw.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 結構，指定 <c>image</c> 物件要繪製的部分。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> enumeration that specifies the units of measure used by the <c>srcRect</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 列舉的成員，指定 <c>srcRect</c> 參數所使用的測量單位。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified portion of the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> at the specified location and with the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的大小，在指定的位置繪製所指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 之指定部分。

trans-unit.source: The `srcRect` parameter specifies a rectangular portion of the `image` object to draw.
trans-unit.target: `srcRect`參數指定的矩形部分`image`繪製的物件。

trans-unit.source: This portion is scaled to fit inside the rectangle specified by the `destRect` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個部分會調整為適合所指定的矩形內`destRect`參數。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.
trans-unit.target: 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立的映像。

trans-unit.source: Creates points that define a parallelogram in which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: 建立定義要在其中繪製影像的平行四邊形的點。

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle to select the portion of the image to draw.
trans-unit.target: 建立矩形來選取要繪製之影像的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Sets the graphics drawing unit to pixel.
trans-unit.target: 設定圖形的繪製單位為像素。

trans-unit.source: Draws the original image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 將原始的影像繪製至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: Creates an additional parallelogram in which to draw an adjusted image.
trans-unit.target: 建立要在其中繪製調整的影像的額外的平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value.
trans-unit.target: 建立並設定為具有較大比一般的 gamma 值調整影像的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Draws the adjusted image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 已調整的影像繪製至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: For the original, unadjusted parallelogram, the position locates the image on the screen, and the size of the rectangle and the size and shape of the parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 針對原始、 未調整平行四邊形，映像會放置在畫面上，位置以及矩形和大小的大小和形狀的平行四邊形的決定的縮放和修剪繪製影像。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 繪製影像左上角的 X 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 所繪製影像左上角的 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that specifies the portion of the <c>image</c> object to draw.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 結構，指定 <c>image</c> 物件要繪製的部分。

trans-unit.source: Draws a portion of an image at a specified location.
trans-unit.target: 將影像的一部分繪製於指定位置。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Image>儲存值，以像素寬度和水平解析度 （每英吋點數） 的值。

trans-unit.source: The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution.
trans-unit.target: 實體的寬度，以英吋，映像的單位是像素寬度除以水平解析度。

trans-unit.source: For example, an image with a pixel width of 360 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 5 inches.
trans-unit.target: 例如，像素寬度 360 和每 72 英吋的水平解析度的影像具有實體寬度為 5 英吋。

trans-unit.source: Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height.
trans-unit.target: 類似的備註適用於像素高度和實體的高度。

trans-unit.source: This method draws a portion of an image using its physical size, so the image portion will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製影像使用的實體大小，因此影像部分會有正確的大小是以英吋，不論顯示裝置的解析度 （每英吋點數） 的一部分。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose an image portion has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設影像部分有 216 像素寬度和水平解析度 72 每英吋的點數。

trans-unit.source: If you call this method to draw that image portion on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image portion will be (216/72)*96 = 288.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫這個方法的裝置解析度為 96 dpi 上繪製影像部分時，所呈現的影像部分的像素寬度會 (216/72) * 96 = 288。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.
trans-unit.target: 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立的映像。

trans-unit.source: Creates the coordinates at which to draw the upper-left corner of the image.
trans-unit.target: 建立要繪製影像的左上角座標。

trans-unit.source: Creates a source rectangle from which to extract a portion of the image.
trans-unit.target: 建立來源矩形要從中擷取映像的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Sets the unit of measure of the source rectangle to pixels.
trans-unit.target: 設定來源矩形的測量的單位為像素。

trans-unit.source: Draws the image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 將影像繪製至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: The size of the source rectangle determines what portion of the unscaled original image is drawn to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 來源矩形的大小會決定哪些部分未縮放的原始影像繪製至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 繪製影像左上角的 X 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 所繪製影像左上角的 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: Width of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 繪製影像的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Height of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 繪製影像的高度。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> at the specified location and with the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的大小，在指定的位置繪製指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The rectangle defined by the `x`, `y`, `width`, and `height` parameters determines the position and size of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 所定義的矩形`x`， `y`， `width`，和`height`參數會決定所繪製影像的大小與位置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.

trans-unit.target: 建立在其中繪製影像的矩形的大小與位置。

trans-unit.source: Draws the image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 將影像繪製至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: The position of the rectangle locates the image on the screen, and the size of the original image and the size of the rectangle determines the scaling of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 矩形的位置影像的畫面上，以及原始映像的大小和矩形的大小會決定所繪製影像的縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 繪製影像左上角的 X 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 所繪製影像左上角的 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure that specifies the portion of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 結構，指定要繪製之 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 的部分。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> enumeration that specifies the units of measure used by the <c>srcRect</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 列舉的成員，指定 <c>srcRect</c> 參數所使用的測量單位。

trans-unit.source: Draws a portion of an image at a specified location.
trans-unit.target: 將影像的一部分繪製於指定位置。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Image>儲存值，以像素寬度和水平解析度 （每英吋點數） 的值。

trans-unit.source: The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution.
trans-unit.target: 實體的寬度，以英吋，映像的單位是像素寬度除以水平解析度。

trans-unit.source: For example, an image with a pixel width of 360 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 5 inches.
trans-unit.target: 例如，像素寬度 360 和每 72 英吋的水平解析度的影像具有實體寬度為 5 英吋。

trans-unit.source: Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height.
trans-unit.target: 類似的備註適用於像素高度和實體的高度。

trans-unit.source: This method draws a portion of an image using its physical size, so the image portion will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製影像使用的實體大小，因此影像部分會有正確的大小是以英吋，不論顯示裝置的解析度 （每英吋點數） 的一部分。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose an image portion has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設影像部分有 216 像素寬度和水平解析度 72 每英吋的點數。

trans-unit.source: If you call this method to draw that image portion on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image portion will be (216/72)*96 = 288.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫這個方法的裝置解析度為 96 dpi 上繪製影像部分時，所呈現的影像部分的像素寬度會 (216/72) * 96 = 288。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.
trans-unit.target: 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立的映像。

trans-unit.source: Creates the position and size of a rectangle in which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: 建立在其中繪製影像的矩形的大小與位置。

trans-unit.source: Draws the image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 將影像繪製至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: The position of the rectangle locates the image on the screen, and the size of the original image and the size of the rectangle determines the scaling of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 矩形的位置影像的畫面上，以及原始映像的大小和矩形的大小會決定所繪製影像的縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of three <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures that define a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 定義平行四邊形之三個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 結構的陣列。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that specifies the portion of the <c>image</c> object to draw.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 結構，指定 <c>image</c> 物件要繪製的部分。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> enumeration that specifies the units of measure used by the <c>srcRect</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 列舉的成員，指定 <c>srcRect</c> 參數所使用的測量單位。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> that specifies recoloring and gamma information for the <c>image</c> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" />，指定 <c>image</c> 物件的重新著色和 Gamma 資訊。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort" /> delegate that specifies a method to call during the drawing of the image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort" /> 委派，在繪製影像期間指定要呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is called frequently to check whether to stop execution of the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Point[],System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes,System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort)" /> method according to application-determined criteria.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會經常被呼叫，以檢查是否要根據應用程式所決定的準則來停止執行 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Point[],System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes,System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified portion of the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> at the specified location and with the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的大小，在指定的位置繪製所指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 之指定部分。

trans-unit.source: The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: `destPoints`參數會指定三個平行四邊形的點。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 三個<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>結構代表平行四邊形左上角、 右上角和左下角。

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: The `srcRect` parameter specifies a rectangular portion of the `image` object to draw.
trans-unit.target: `srcRect`參數指定的矩形部分`image`繪製的物件。

trans-unit.source: This portion is scaled and sheared to fit inside the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個部分會調整及修剪來配合所指定的平行四邊形`destPoints`參數。

trans-unit.source: This overload with the `callback` parameter provides the means to stop the drawing of an image once it starts according to criteria determined by the application.
trans-unit.target: 具有這個多載`callback`參數提供的方式，一旦啟動根據應用程式所決定的準則就會停止映像的繪圖。

trans-unit.source: For example, an application could start drawing a large image and the user might scroll the image off the screen, in which case the application could stop the drawing.
trans-unit.target: 例如，應用程式無法在繪製大型影像，使用者可能會捲動超出螢幕，在其中應用程式可能會停止繪製影像。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code first defines a callback method for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort> delegate; the definition is simplistic and merely tests to see whether the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method calls it with a null `callBackData` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會先定義回呼方法，以便<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort>委派; 定義是最簡單，而且只是測試以查看是否<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法會呼叫它具有 null`callBackData`參數。

trans-unit.source: The main body of the example performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 此範例的主要本文會執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort> callback method:
trans-unit.target: 建立的執行個體<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort>回呼方法：

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.
trans-unit.target: 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立的映像。

trans-unit.source: Creates points that define a parallelogram in which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: 建立定義要在其中繪製影像的平行四邊形的點。

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle to select the portion of the image to draw.
trans-unit.target: 建立矩形來選取要繪製之影像的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Sets the graphics drawing unit to pixel.
trans-unit.target: 設定圖形的繪製單位為像素。

trans-unit.source: Draws the original image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 將原始的影像繪製至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: Creates an additional parallelogram in which to draw an adjusted image.
trans-unit.target: 建立要在其中繪製調整的影像的額外的平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value.
trans-unit.target: 建立並設定為具有較大比一般的 gamma 值調整影像的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Draws the adjusted image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 已調整的影像繪製至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: For the original, unadjusted parallelogram, the position locates the image on the screen, and the size of the rectangle and the size and shape of the parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 針對原始、 未調整平行四邊形，映像會放置在畫面上，位置以及矩形和大小的大小和形狀的平行四邊形的決定的縮放和修剪繪製影像。

trans-unit.source: Because this example uses an overload that does not pass a `callBackData` parameter, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort> callback returns `true`, which causes the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method to end, and the exception-handling code included in the example prints out the exception text rather than drawing the image.
trans-unit.target: 由於這個範例會使用多載未通過`callBackData`參數，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort>回呼傳回`true`，這會導致<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法結束時，和包含在此範例中的例外狀況處理程式碼會列印出例外狀況文字，而非繪製影像。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of three <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures that define a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 定義平行四邊形之三個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 結構的陣列。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure that specifies the portion of the <c>image</c> object to draw.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 結構，指定 <c>image</c> 物件要繪製的部分。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> enumeration that specifies the units of measure used by the <c>srcRect</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 列舉的成員，指定 <c>srcRect</c> 參數所使用的測量單位。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> that specifies recoloring and gamma information for the <c>image</c> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" />，指定 <c>image</c> 物件的重新著色和 Gamma 資訊。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort" /> delegate that specifies a method to call during the drawing of the image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort" /> 委派，在繪製影像期間指定要呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is called frequently to check whether to stop execution of the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Drawing.RectangleF,System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes,System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort)" /> method according to application-determined criteria.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會經常被呼叫，以檢查是否要根據應用程式所決定的準則來停止執行 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Drawing.RectangleF,System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes,System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified portion of the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> at the specified location and with the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的大小，在指定的位置繪製所指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 之指定部分。

trans-unit.source: The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: `destPoints`參數會指定三個平行四邊形的點。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 三個<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>結構代表平行四邊形左上角、 右上角和左下角。

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: The `srcRect` parameter specifies a rectangular portion of the `image` object to draw.
trans-unit.target: `srcRect`參數指定的矩形部分`image`繪製的物件。

trans-unit.source: This portion is scaled and sheared to fit inside the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個部分會調整及修剪來配合所指定的平行四邊形`destPoints`參數。

trans-unit.source: This overload with the `callback` parameter provides the means to stop the drawing of an image once it starts according to criteria determined by the application.
trans-unit.target: 具有這個多載`callback`參數提供的方式，一旦啟動根據應用程式所決定的準則就會停止映像的繪圖。

trans-unit.source: For example, an application could start drawing a large image and the user might scroll the image off the screen, in which case the application could stop the drawing.
trans-unit.target: 例如，應用程式無法在繪製大型影像，使用者可能會捲動超出螢幕，在其中應用程式可能會停止繪製影像。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code first defines a callback method for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort> delegate; the definition is simplistic and merely tests to see whether the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method calls it with a null `callBackData` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會先定義回呼方法，以便<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort>委派; 定義是最簡單，而且只是測試以查看是否<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法會呼叫它具有 null`callBackData`參數。

trans-unit.source: The main body of the example performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 此範例的主要本文會執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort> callback method.
trans-unit.target: 建立的執行個體<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort>回呼方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.
trans-unit.target: 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立的映像。

trans-unit.source: Creates points that define a parallelogram in which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: 建立定義要在其中繪製影像的平行四邊形的點。

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle to select the portion of the image to draw.
trans-unit.target: 建立矩形來選取要繪製之影像的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Sets the graphics drawing unit to pixel.
trans-unit.target: 設定圖形的繪製單位為像素。

trans-unit.source: Draws the original image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 將原始的影像繪製至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: Creates an additional parallelogram in which to draw an adjusted image.
trans-unit.target: 建立要在其中繪製調整的影像的額外的平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value.
trans-unit.target: 建立並設定為具有較大比一般的 gamma 值調整影像的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Draws the adjusted image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 已調整的影像繪製至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: For the original, unadjusted parallelogram, the position locates the image on the screen, and the size of the rectangle and the size and shape of the parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 針對原始、 未調整平行四邊形，映像會放置在畫面上，位置以及矩形和大小的大小和形狀的平行四邊形的決定的縮放和修剪繪製影像。

trans-unit.source: Because this example uses an overload that does not pass a `callBackData` parameter, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort> callback returns `true`, which causes the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method to end, and the exception-handling code included in the example prints out the exception text rather than drawing the image.
trans-unit.target: 由於這個範例會使用多載未通過`callBackData`參數，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort>回呼傳回`true`，這會導致<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法結束時，和包含在此範例中的例外狀況處理程式碼會列印出例外狀況文字，而非繪製影像。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of three <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures that define a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 定義平行四邊形之三個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 結構的陣列。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that specifies the portion of the <c>image</c> object to draw.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 結構，指定 <c>image</c> 物件要繪製的部分。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> enumeration that specifies the units of measure used by the <c>srcRect</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 列舉的成員，指定 <c>srcRect</c> 參數所使用的測量單位。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> that specifies recoloring and gamma information for the <c>image</c> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" />，指定 <c>image</c> 物件的重新著色和 Gamma 資訊。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort" /> delegate that specifies a method to call during the drawing of the image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort" /> 委派，在繪製影像期間指定要呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is called frequently to check whether to stop execution of the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Point[],System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes,System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort,System.Int32)" /> method according to application-determined criteria.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會經常被呼叫，以檢查是否要根據應用程式所決定的準則來停止執行 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Point[],System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes,System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort,System.Int32)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Value specifying additional data for the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort" /> delegate to use when checking whether to stop execution of the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Point[],System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes,System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort,System.Int32)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 數值，指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort" /> 委派在檢查是否停止執行 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Point[],System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes,System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort,System.Int32)" /> 方法時要使用的額外資料。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified portion of the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> at the specified location and with the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的大小，在指定的位置繪製所指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 之指定部分。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.

trans-unit.target: `srcRect`參數指定的矩形部分`image`繪製的物件。

trans-unit.target: 這個部分會調整及修剪來配合所指定的平行四邊形`destPoints`參數。

trans-unit.source: This overload with the `callback` and `callbackData` parameters provides the means to stop the drawing of an image once it starts according to criteria and data determined by the application.
trans-unit.target: 具有這個多載`callback`和`callbackData`參數提供的方式，根據準則和資料取決於應用程式啟動之後停止映像的繪圖。

trans-unit.source: For example, an application could start drawing a large image and the user might scroll the image off the screen, in which case the application could stop the drawing.
trans-unit.target: 例如，應用程式無法在繪製大型影像，使用者可能會捲動超出螢幕，在其中應用程式可能會停止繪製影像。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort> callback method.

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.

trans-unit.source: Because this example uses an overload that passes a `callBackData` parameter, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort> callback returns `false`, which causes the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method to continue, and the example draws the adjusted image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 由於這個範例會使用傳遞的多載`callBackData`參數，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort>回呼傳回`false`，這會導致<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法，若要繼續，與範例調整的影像繪製至畫面。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of three <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures that define a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 定義平行四邊形之三個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 結構的陣列。

trans-unit.target: 由於這個範例會使用傳遞的多載`callBackData`參數，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort>回呼傳回`false`，這會導致<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法，若要繼續，與範例調整的影像繪製至畫面。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that specifies the location and size of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 結構，指定繪製影像的位置和大小。

trans-unit.source: The image is scaled to fit the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 縮放影像來符合矩形。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the portion of the source image to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製之來源影像部分左上角的 X 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the portion of the source image to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製之來源影像部分左上角的 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: Width of the portion of the source image to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製之來源影像部分的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Height of the portion of the source image to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製之來源影像部分的高度。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> enumeration that specifies the units of measure used to determine the source rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 列舉的成員，指定用來判斷來源矩形的測量單位。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified portion of the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> at the specified location and with the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的大小，在指定的位置繪製所指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 之指定部分。

trans-unit.source: The `srcX`, `srcY`, `srcWidth`, and `srcHeight` parameters specify a rectangular portion, of the `image` object to draw.
trans-unit.target: `srcX`， `srcY`， `srcWidth`，和`srcHeight`參數指定矩形的部分，`image`繪製的物件。

trans-unit.source: The rectangle is relative to the upper-left corner of the source image.
trans-unit.target: 矩形是相對於來源影像的左上角。

trans-unit.source: This portion is scaled to fit inside the rectangle specified by the `destRect` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個部分會調整為適合所指定的矩形內`destRect`參數。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.
trans-unit.target: 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立的映像。

trans-unit.source: Creates a destination rectangle in which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: 建立要在其中繪製影像的目的地矩形。

trans-unit.source: Creates the coordinates of a source rectangle from which to extract a portion of the image.
trans-unit.target: 建立要從中擷取映像的一部分的來源矩形的座標。

trans-unit.source: Sets the unit of measure of the source rectangle to pixels.
trans-unit.target: 設定來源矩形的測量的單位為像素。

trans-unit.source: Draws the image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 將影像繪製至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: The position of the destination rectangle locates the image on the screen, and the sizes of the source and destination rectangles determine the scaling of the drawn image, and the size of the source rectangle determines what portion of the original image is drawn to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 在畫面上，目的地矩形的位置找出的映像來源和目的地矩形的大小會決定所繪製影像，縮放和來源矩形的大小會決定哪些部分原始影像繪製至畫面。

trans-unit.source: This portion is scaled to fit inside the rectangle specified by the `destRect` object.
trans-unit.target: 這個部分會調整為適合所指定的矩形內`destRect`物件。

trans-unit.source: This overload with the `callback` parameter provides the means to stop the drawing of an image once it starts according to criteria determined by the application.
trans-unit.target: 具有這個多載`callback`參數提供的方式，一旦啟動根據應用程式所決定的準則就會停止映像的繪圖。

trans-unit.source: For example, an application could start drawing a large image and the user might scroll the image off the screen, in which case the application could stop the drawing.
trans-unit.target: 例如，應用程式無法在繪製大型影像，使用者可能會捲動超出螢幕，在其中應用程式可能會停止繪製影像。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code first defines a callback method for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort> delegate; the definition is simplistic and merely tests to see whether the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method calls it with a null `callBackData` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會先定義回呼方法，以便<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort>委派; 定義是最簡單，而且只是測試以查看是否<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法會呼叫它具有 null`callBackData`參數。

trans-unit.source: The main body of the example performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 此範例的主要本文會執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort> callback method.
trans-unit.target: 建立的執行個體<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort>回呼方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.
trans-unit.target: 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立的映像。

trans-unit.source: Creates points that define a destination rectangle in which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: 建立定義要在其中繪製影像的目的地矩形的點。

trans-unit.source: Creates a source rectangle to select the portion of the image to draw.
trans-unit.target: 建立來源矩形來選取要繪製之影像的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Sets the graphics drawing unit to pixel.
trans-unit.target: 設定圖形的繪製單位為像素。

trans-unit.source: Draws the original image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 將原始的影像繪製至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: Creates an additional destination rectangle in which to draw an adjusted image.
trans-unit.target: 建立要在其中繪製調整的影像的其他目的地矩形。

trans-unit.source: Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value.
trans-unit.target: 建立並設定為具有較大比一般的 gamma 值調整影像的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Draws the adjusted image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 已調整的影像繪製至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: For the original, unadjusted destination rectangle, the position locates the image on the screen, and the size of the source rectangle and the size and shape of the destination rectangle determines the scaling of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 針對原始、 未調整目的地矩形，影像會放置在畫面上，位置和來源矩形和大小的大小和目的地矩形的圖形會決定所繪製影像的縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: Because this example uses an overload that does not pass a `callBackData` parameter, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort> callback returns `true`, which causes the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method to end, and the exception-handling code included in the example prints out the exception text rather than drawing the image.
trans-unit.target: 由於這個範例會使用多載未通過`callBackData`參數，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort>回呼傳回`true`，這會導致<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法結束時，和包含在此範例中的例外狀況處理程式碼會列印出例外狀況文字，而非繪製影像。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that specifies the location and size of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 結構，指定繪製影像的位置和大小。

trans-unit.source: The image is scaled to fit the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 縮放影像來符合矩形。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the portion of the source image to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製之來源影像部分左上角的 X 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the portion of the source image to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製之來源影像部分左上角的 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: Width of the portion of the source image to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製之來源影像部分的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Height of the portion of the source image to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製之來源影像部分的高度。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> enumeration that specifies the units of measure used to determine the source rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 列舉的成員，指定用來判斷來源矩形的測量單位。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> that specifies recoloring and gamma information for the <c>image</c> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" />，指定 <c>image</c> 物件的重新著色和 Gamma 資訊。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort" /> delegate that specifies a method to call during the drawing of the image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort" /> 委派，在繪製影像期間指定要呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is called frequently to check whether to stop execution of the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes,System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort)" /> method according to application-determined criteria.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會經常被呼叫，以檢查是否要根據應用程式所決定的準則來停止執行 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes,System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified portion of the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> at the specified location and with the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的大小，在指定的位置繪製所指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 之指定部分。

trans-unit.source: The `srcX`, `srcY`, `srcWidth`, and `srcHeight` parameters specify a rectangular portion, of the `image` object to draw.
trans-unit.target: `srcX`， `srcY`， `srcWidth`，和`srcHeight`參數指定矩形的部分，`image`繪製的物件。

trans-unit.source: The rectangle is relative to the upper-left corner of the source image.
trans-unit.target: 矩形是相對於來源影像的左上角。

trans-unit.source: This portion is scaled to fit inside the rectangle specified by the `destRect` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個部分會調整為適合所指定的矩形內`destRect`參數。

trans-unit.source: This overload with the `callback` and `callbackData` parameters provides the means to stop the drawing of an image once it starts according to criteria and data determined by the application.
trans-unit.target: 具有這個多載`callback`和`callbackData`參數提供的方式，根據準則和資料取決於應用程式啟動之後停止映像的繪圖。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort" /> delegate that specifies a method to call during the drawing of the image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort" /> 委派，在繪製影像期間指定要呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is called frequently to check whether to stop execution of the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes,System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort,System.IntPtr)" /> method according to application-determined criteria.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會經常被呼叫，以檢查是否要根據應用程式所決定的準則來停止執行 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes,System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort,System.IntPtr)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Value specifying additional data for the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort" /> delegate to use when checking whether to stop execution of the <see langword="DrawImage" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 數值，指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort" /> 委派在檢查是否停止執行 <see langword="DrawImage" /> 方法時要使用的額外資料。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified portion of the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> at the specified location and with the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的大小，在指定的位置繪製所指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 之指定部分。

trans-unit.source: The `srcX`, `srcY`, `srcWidth`, and `srcHeight` parameters specify a rectangular portion, of the `image` object to draw.
trans-unit.target: `srcX`， `srcY`， `srcWidth`，和`srcHeight`參數指定矩形的部分，`image`繪製的物件。

trans-unit.source: The rectangle is relative to the upper-left corner of the source image.
trans-unit.target: 矩形是相對於來源影像的左上角。

trans-unit.source: This portion is scaled to fit inside the rectangle specified by the `destRect` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個部分會調整為適合所指定的矩形內`destRect`參數。

trans-unit.source: This overload with the `callback` and `callbackData` parameters provides the means to stop the drawing of an image once it starts according to criteria and data determined by the application.
trans-unit.target: 具有這個多載`callback`和`callbackData`參數提供的方式，根據準則和資料取決於應用程式啟動之後停止映像的繪圖。

trans-unit.source: For example, an application could start drawing a large image and the user might scroll the image off the screen, in which case the application could stop the drawing.
trans-unit.target: 例如，應用程式無法在繪製大型影像，使用者可能會捲動超出螢幕，在其中應用程式可能會停止繪製影像。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code first defines a callback method for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort> delegate; the definition is simplistic and merely tests to see whether the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method calls it with a null `callBackData` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會先定義回呼方法，以便<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort>委派; 定義是最簡單，而且只是測試以查看是否<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法會呼叫它具有 null`callBackData`參數。

trans-unit.source: The main body of the example performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 此範例的主要本文會執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort> callback method.
trans-unit.target: 建立的執行個體<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort>回呼方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example.
trans-unit.target: 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立的映像。

trans-unit.source: Creates points that define a destination rectangle in which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: 建立定義要在其中繪製影像的目的地矩形的點。

trans-unit.source: Creates a source rectangle to select the portion of the image to draw.
trans-unit.target: 建立來源矩形來選取要繪製之影像的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Sets the graphics drawing unit to pixel.
trans-unit.target: 設定圖形的繪製單位為像素。

trans-unit.source: Draws the original image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 將原始的影像繪製至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: Creates an additional destination rectangle in which to draw an adjusted image.
trans-unit.target: 建立要在其中繪製調整的影像的其他目的地矩形。

trans-unit.source: Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value.
trans-unit.target: 建立並設定為具有較大比一般的 gamma 值調整影像的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Draws the adjusted image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 已調整的影像繪製至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: For the original, unadjusted destination rectangle, the position locates the image on the screen, and the size of the source rectangle and the size and shape of the destination rectangle determines the scaling of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 針對原始、 未調整目的地矩形，影像會放置在畫面上，位置和來源矩形和大小的大小和目的地矩形的圖形會決定所繪製影像的縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: Because this example uses an overload that passes a `callBackData` parameter, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort> callback returns `false`, which causes the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method to continue, and the example draws the adjusted image to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 由於這個範例會使用傳遞的多載`callBackData`參數，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageAbort>回呼傳回`false`，這會導致<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法，若要繼續，與範例調整的影像繪製至畫面。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified image using its original physical size at the location specified by a coordinate pair.
trans-unit.target: 使用原始的實體大小將指定的影像繪製於座標對所指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structure that specifies the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 結構，指定繪製影像的左上角。

trans-unit.source: Draws a specified image using its original physical size at a specified location.
trans-unit.target: 使用原始的實體大小將指定影像繪製於指定位置。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Image>儲存值，以像素寬度和水平解析度 （每英吋點數） 的值。

trans-unit.source: The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution.
trans-unit.target: 實體的寬度，以英吋，映像的單位是像素寬度除以水平解析度。

trans-unit.source: For example, an image with a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 3 inches.
trans-unit.target: 例如，216 像素寬度和水平解析度每 72 英吋的映像有實體 3 英吋的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height.
trans-unit.target: 類似的備註適用於像素高度和實體的高度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageUnscaled%2A> method draws an image using its physical size, so the image will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageUnscaled%2A>方法繪製影像使用的實體大小，讓映像將會擁有正確的大小是以英吋，不論顯示裝置的解析度 （每英吋點數）。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose an image has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設映像有 216 像素寬度和水平解析度 72 每英吋的點數。

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageUnscaled%2A> to draw that image on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image will be (216/72)*96 = 288.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageUnscaled%2A>解析度為 96 dpi 的裝置上繪製該映像，呈現影像的像素寬度會 (216/72) * 96 = 288。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.target: 建立要繪製影像的左上角的點。

trans-unit.source: Draws the entire image using its physical size.
trans-unit.target: 使用的實體大小將整個影像繪製。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 矩形的 X 和 Y 屬性指定左上角。

trans-unit.source: The Width and Height properties are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Width 和 Height 屬性會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Draws a specified image using its original physical size at a specified location.

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageUnscaled%2A> to draw that image on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image will be (216/72)*96 = 288.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 繪製影像左上角的 X 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 所繪製影像左上角的 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified image using its original physical size at the location specified by a coordinate pair.
trans-unit.target: 使用原始的實體大小將指定的影像繪製於座標對所指定的位置。

trans-unit.target: 實體的寬度，以英吋，映像的單位是像素寬度除以水平解析度。

trans-unit.target: 例如，216 像素寬度和水平解析度每 72 英吋的映像有實體 3 英吋的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height.
trans-unit.target: 類似的備註適用於像素高度和實體的高度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageUnscaled%2A> method draws an image using its physical size, so the image will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageUnscaled%2A>方法繪製影像使用的實體大小，讓映像將會擁有正確的大小是以英吋，不論顯示裝置的解析度 （每英吋點數）。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.target: 從 JPEG 檔案、 SampImag.jpg，在此範例的資料夾中建立的映像。

trans-unit.target: 使用的實體大小將整個影像繪製。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> is <see langword="null" />.
