trans-unit.target: 要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> in which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中繪製影像的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified image without scaling and clips it, if necessary, to fit in the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 必要時，繪製指定的影像，而不需要加以縮放或裁剪以容納在指定的矩形中。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageUnscaledAndClipped%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImageUnscaledAndClipped%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行這個範例，請將其貼入 Windows Form 中。

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawImageUnscaled` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件和呼叫`DrawImageUnscaled`方法從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="image" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="image" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws a line connecting the two points specified by the coordinate pairs.
trans-unit.target: 繪製連接由座標對所指定的兩個點之直線。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that determines the color, width, and style of the line.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，決定直線的色彩、寬度和樣式。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structure that represents the first point to connect.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 結構，表示要連接的第一個點。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structure that represents the second point to connect.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 結構，表示要連接的第二個點。

trans-unit.source: Draws a line connecting two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: 繪製連接兩個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 結構的直線。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a black pen.
trans-unit.target: 建立黑色畫筆。

trans-unit.source: Creates points for the endpoints of the line.
trans-unit.target: 建立點線條的端點。

trans-unit.source: Draws the line to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 將線條繪製至螢幕。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pen" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pen" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that determines the color, width, and style of the line.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，決定直線的色彩、寬度和樣式。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure that represents the first point to connect.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 結構，表示要連接的第一個點。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure that represents the second point to connect.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 結構，表示要連接的第二個點。

trans-unit.source: Draws a line connecting two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: 繪製連接兩個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 結構的直線。

trans-unit.source: This method draws a line connecting the two points specified by the `pt1` and p`2` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製連接兩個點所指定的線條`pt1`和 p`2`參數。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a black pen.
trans-unit.target: 建立黑色畫筆。

trans-unit.source: Creates the coordinates of the endpoints of the line.
trans-unit.target: 建立線條的端點的座標。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pen" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws a series of line segments that connect an array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: 繪製連接 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 結構陣列的一系列直線線段。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that determines the color, width, and style of the line segments.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，決定線段的色彩、寬度和樣式。

trans-unit.source: Array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures that represent the points to connect.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 結構的陣列，此結構表示要連接的點。

trans-unit.source: Draws a series of line segments that connect an array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: 繪製連接 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 結構陣列的一系列直線線段。

trans-unit.source: This method draws a series of lines connecting an array of ending points.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製一系列的連接線的結束點陣列。

trans-unit.source: The first two points in the array specify the first line.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中的前兩個點指定的第一行。

trans-unit.source: Each additional point specifies the end of a line segment whose starting point is the ending point of the previous line segment.
trans-unit.target: 每個額外的點指定直線線段的起點是先前的直線線段的結束點的結束。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Code creates a black pen.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會建立黑色的畫筆。

trans-unit.source: Creates an array of points of segments of the line.
trans-unit.target: 建立直線線段的點陣列。

trans-unit.source: Draws the connected line segments to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 繪製之連接的直線線段至畫面。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pen" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pen" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="points" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="points" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that determines the color, width, and style of the path.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，決定路徑的色彩、寬度和樣式。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" />.
trans-unit.target: 繪製 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" />。

trans-unit.source: The current transformation in the graphic context is applied to the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> before it is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 圖形內容中目前的轉換套用至<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>繪製之前。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a graphics path object and adds an ellipse to it.
trans-unit.target: 建立圖形路徑物件，並加入至其中的橢圓形。

trans-unit.source: Creates a black pen.
trans-unit.target: 建立黑色畫筆。

trans-unit.source: Draws the graphics path to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 繪製至畫面的圖形路徑。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pen" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pen" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws a pie shape defined by an ellipse specified by a coordinate pair, a width, a height, and two radial lines.
trans-unit.target: 繪製由橢圓形所定義的派形，該橢圓形是由座標對、寬度、高度和兩條放射線所指定。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that determines the color, width, and style of the pie shape.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，決定派形的色彩、寬度和樣式。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that represents the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie shape comes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 結構，表示定義派形的來源橢圓形之周框。

trans-unit.source: Angle measured in degrees clockwise from the x-axis to the first side of the pie shape.
trans-unit.target: 以度為單位，依順時針方向測量之從 X 軸到派形的第一個邊的角度。

trans-unit.source: Angle measured in degrees clockwise from the <c>startAngle</c> parameter to the second side of the pie shape.
trans-unit.target: 以度為單位，依順時針方向從 <c>startAngle</c> 參數到派形的第二個邊所測量的角度。

trans-unit.source: Draws a pie shape defined by an ellipse specified by a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure and two radial lines.
trans-unit.target: 繪製由 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 結構和兩條放射線指定的橢圓形所定義的派形。

trans-unit.source: This method draws a pie shape defined by an arc of an ellipse and the two radial lines that intersect with the endpoints of the arc. The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製由橢圓形和兩條放射線交集的弧形弧線的端點定義的派形。周框定義橢圓形。

trans-unit.source: The pie shape consists of the two radial lines defined by the `startAngle` and `sweepAngle` parameters, and the arc between the intersections of those radial lines with the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 包含的兩條放射線所定義的派形`startAngle`和`sweepAngle`參數，以及這些放射線橢圓形交集之間的弧度。

trans-unit.source: If the `sweepAngle` parameter is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, it is treated as if it were 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sweepAngle`參數大於 360 度或小於-360 度，它會被視為分別是 360 度或-360 度。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a black pen.
trans-unit.target: 建立黑色畫筆。

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle that bounds a complete ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 建立住完整橢圓形的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Defines the angles at which to start drawing (relative to the x axis) and through which to draw (both in a clockwise direction).
trans-unit.target: 定義要繪圖 （相對於 x 軸） 的開始角度和，以繪製 （順時針方向兩者）。

trans-unit.source: Draws the pie segment to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 繪製到螢幕的派形區段。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pen" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pen" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that determines the color, width, and style of the pie shape.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，決定派形的色彩、寬度和樣式。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure that represents the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie shape comes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 結構，表示定義派形的來源橢圓形之周框。

trans-unit.source: Angle measured in degrees clockwise from the x-axis to the first side of the pie shape.
trans-unit.target: 以度為單位，依順時針方向測量之從 X 軸到派形的第一個邊的角度。

trans-unit.source: Angle measured in degrees clockwise from the <c>startAngle</c> parameter to the second side of the pie shape.
trans-unit.target: 以度為單位，依順時針方向從 <c>startAngle</c> 參數到派形的第二個邊所測量的角度。

trans-unit.source: Draws a pie shape defined by an ellipse specified by a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure and two radial lines.
trans-unit.target: 繪製由 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 結構和兩條放射線指定的橢圓形所定義的派形。

trans-unit.source: This method draws a pie shape defined by an arc of an ellipse and the two radial lines that intersect with the endpoints of the arc. The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製由橢圓形和兩條放射線交集的弧形弧線的端點定義的派形。周框定義橢圓形。

trans-unit.source: The pie shape consists of the two radial lines defined by the `startAngle` and `sweepAngle` parameters, and the arc between the intersections of those radial lines with the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 包含的兩條放射線所定義的派形`startAngle`和`sweepAngle`參數，以及這些放射線橢圓形交集之間的弧度。

trans-unit.source: If the `sweepAngle` parameter is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, it is treated as if it were 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sweepAngle`參數大於 360 度或小於-360 度，它會被視為分別是 360 度或-360 度。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a black pen.
trans-unit.target: 建立黑色畫筆。

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle that bounds a complete ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 建立住完整橢圓形的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Defines the angles at which to start drawing (relative to the x axis) and through which to draw (both in a clockwise direction).
trans-unit.target: 定義要繪圖 （相對於 x 軸） 的開始角度和，以繪製 （順時針方向兩者）。

trans-unit.source: Draws the pie segment to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 繪製到螢幕的派形區段。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pen" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pen" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that determines the color, width, and style of the pie shape.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，決定派形的色彩、寬度和樣式。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie shape comes.
trans-unit.target: 週框左上角的 X 座標，這個週框定義派形的來源橢圓形。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie shape comes.
trans-unit.target: 週框左上角的 X 座標，這個週框定義派形的來源橢圓形。

trans-unit.source: Width of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie shape comes.
trans-unit.target: 週框的寬度，這個週框定義派形的來源橢圓形。

trans-unit.source: Height of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie shape comes.
trans-unit.target: 週框的高度，這個週框定義派形的來源橢圓形。

trans-unit.source: Angle measured in degrees clockwise from the x-axis to the first side of the pie shape.
trans-unit.target: 以度為單位，依順時針方向測量之從 X 軸到派形的第一個邊的角度。

trans-unit.source: Angle measured in degrees clockwise from the <c>startAngle</c> parameter to the second side of the pie shape.
trans-unit.target: 以度為單位，依順時針方向從 <c>startAngle</c> 參數到派形的第二個邊所測量的角度。

trans-unit.source: Draws a pie shape defined by an ellipse specified by a coordinate pair, a width, a height, and two radial lines.
trans-unit.target: 繪製由橢圓形所定義的派形，該橢圓形是由座標對、寬度、高度和兩條放射線所指定。

trans-unit.source: This method draws a pie shape defined by an arc of an ellipse and the two radial lines that intersect with the endpoints of the arc. The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle described by the `x`, `y`, `width`, and `height` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製由橢圓形和兩條放射線交集的弧形弧線的端點定義的派形。所描述的週框定義橢圓形`x`， `y`， `width`，和`height`參數。

trans-unit.source: The pie shape consists of the two radial lines defined by the `startAngle` and `sweepAngle` parameters, and the arc between the intersections of those radial lines with the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 包含的兩條放射線所定義的派形`startAngle`和`sweepAngle`參數，以及這些放射線橢圓形交集之間的弧度。

trans-unit.source: If the `sweepAngle` parameter is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, it is treated as if it were 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sweepAngle`參數大於 360 度或小於-360 度，它會被視為分別是 360 度或-360 度。

trans-unit.source: Creates a black pen.
trans-unit.target: 建立黑色畫筆。

trans-unit.source: Creates the position and size of a rectangle that bounds a complete ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 建立的位置和大小住完整橢圓形的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Defines the angles at which to start drawing (relative to the x axis) and through which to draw (both in a clockwise direction).

trans-unit.source: Angle measured in degrees clockwise from the x-axis to the first side of the pie shape.
trans-unit.target: 以度為單位，依順時針方向測量之從 X 軸到派形的第一個邊的角度。

trans-unit.source: Angle measured in degrees clockwise from the <c>startAngle</c> parameter to the second side of the pie shape.
trans-unit.target: 以度為單位，依順時針方向從 <c>startAngle</c> 參數到派形的第二個邊所測量的角度。

trans-unit.source: The pie shape consists of the two radial lines defined by the `startAngle` and `sweepAngle` parameters, and the arc between the intersections of those radial lines with the ellipse.

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a black pen.
trans-unit.target: 建立黑色畫筆。

trans-unit.source: Creates the position and size of a rectangle that bounds a complete ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 建立的位置和大小住完整橢圓形的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Defines the angles at which to start drawing (relative to the x axis) and through which to draw (both in a clockwise direction).
trans-unit.target: 定義要繪圖 （相對於 x 軸） 的開始角度和，以繪製 （順時針方向兩者）。

trans-unit.source: Draws the pie segment to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 繪製到螢幕的派形區段。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pen" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pen" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws a polygon defined by an array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: 繪製由 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 結構陣列定義的多邊形。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that determines the color, width, and style of the polygon.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，決定多邊形的色彩、寬度和樣式。

trans-unit.source: Array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures that represent the vertices of the polygon.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 結構的陣列，表示多邊形的頂點。

trans-unit.source: Draws a polygon defined by an array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: 繪製由 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 結構陣列定義的多邊形。

trans-unit.source: Every pair of two consecutive points in the array specifies a side of the polygon.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中的兩個連續點的每一對指定的側邊的多邊形。

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the last point and the first point of the array do not coincide, they specify the last side of the polygon.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果不重疊的最後一個點和陣列的第一個點，它們會指定最後一個的側邊的多邊形。

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the last point and the first of the array point do not coincide, they specify the last side of the polygon.

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a text string to draw.
trans-unit.target: 建立要繪製的文字字串。

trans-unit.source: Defines the font as Arial (16pt).
trans-unit.target: 定義之字型為 Arial (16pt)。

trans-unit.source: Creates a solid, black brush to draw with.
trans-unit.target: 建立實心、 黑色的筆刷，來繪製。

trans-unit.source: Creates a point for the upper-left corner at which to draw the text.
trans-unit.target: 建立要繪製文字左上角的點。

trans-unit.source: Draws the string to the screen using the font, brush, and destination point.
trans-unit.target: 繪製到螢幕使用的字型、 筆刷和目的地點的字串。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="brush" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified text string in the specified rectangle with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> and <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 物件，將指定的文字字串繪製在指定的矩形中。

trans-unit.source: The text represented by the `s` parameter is drawn inside the rectangle represented by the `layoutRectangle` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 所代表的文字`s`參數所表示的矩形內繪製`layoutRectangle`參數。

trans-unit.source: If the text does not fit inside the rectangle, it is truncated at the nearest word.
trans-unit.target: 如果文字不符合置於矩形內，它會截斷在最接近的字。

trans-unit.source: To further manipulate how the string is drawn inside the rectangle use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> overload that takes a <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>.
trans-unit.target: 若要進一步操作字串將矩形內部的繪製方式<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>採用多載<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a text string to draw.
trans-unit.target: 建立要繪製的文字字串。

trans-unit.source: Defines the font as Arial (16pt).
trans-unit.target: 定義之字型為 Arial (16pt)。

trans-unit.source: Creates a solid, black brush to draw with.
trans-unit.target: 建立實心、 黑色的筆刷，來繪製。

trans-unit.source: Creates the coordinates of a point for the upper-left corner at which to draw the text.
trans-unit.target: 建立點要繪製文字左上角的座標。

trans-unit.source: Sets the format of the string to draw vertically
trans-unit.target: 設定要垂直地繪製的字串格式

trans-unit.source: Draws the string to the screen using the font, brush, destination point, and format.
trans-unit.target: 繪製到螢幕使用的字型、 筆刷、 目的地點和格式的字串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="brush" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="brush" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="s" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer" /> that represents the container this method restores.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer" />，表示這個方法還原的容器。

trans-unit.source: Closes the current graphics container and restores the state of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to the state saved by a call to the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 關閉目前的圖形容器，並將這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的狀態還原成藉由呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer" /> 方法所儲存的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Use this method with the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method to create nested graphics containers.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法加<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法，以建立巢狀的圖形容器。

trans-unit.source: Graphics containers retain graphics state, such as transformation, clipping region, and rendering properties.
trans-unit.target: 圖形容器保留圖形的狀態，例如轉換、 裁剪區域和呈現屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, an information block that holds the state of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is put on a stack.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>，保留狀態的資訊區塊<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>放在堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> that identifies that information block.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>可識別該資訊區塊。

trans-unit.source: When you pass the identifying object to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to the state it was in at the time of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: 當您識別物件傳遞至<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法，資訊區塊會從堆疊移除，且用來還原<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>的時間當時的狀態<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Containers can be nested; that is, you can call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method several times before you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以是巢狀容器。也就是說，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法多次，才能呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Each time you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> for the information block.
trans-unit.target: 每次呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法，一個資訊區塊會放在堆疊上，而且您收到<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>資訊區塊。

trans-unit.source: When you pass one of those objects to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is returned to the state it was in at the time of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call that returned that particular <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞時，這些物件的其中一個<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>回復成的時間當時的狀態<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法呼叫傳回的特定<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>。

trans-unit.source: The information block placed on the stack by that <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call are also removed.
trans-unit.target: 資訊區塊放置在堆疊上的<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法呼叫會從堆疊移除，且之後的所有資訊區塊放都置於該堆疊上<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法呼叫也會移除。

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>相同呼叫堆疊上方法的位置資訊區塊<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Just as an <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call, a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: 就像<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法呼叫搭配<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>方法呼叫搭配<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法或由<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法) 之後的對應呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法會從堆疊移除。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, when you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，當您呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法或由<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法) 之後的對應呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法會從堆疊移除。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Opens a new graphics container and saves the old container.
trans-unit.target: 會開啟新的圖形容器，並儲存舊的容器。

trans-unit.source: Translates the world coordinates in the container.
trans-unit.target: 將轉譯的容器中的全局座標。

trans-unit.source: Fills a red rectangle in the (translated coordinates of the) new container.
trans-unit.target: 會以紅色矩形填滿 (已轉換的座標) 新的容器。

trans-unit.source: Closes the new container and restores the saved container.
trans-unit.target: 關閉新的容器，並還原已儲存的容器。

trans-unit.source: Fills a green rectangle (to the untranslated coordinates) of the saved container.
trans-unit.target: 填滿儲存容器的綠色矩形 （至未轉換的座標）。

trans-unit.source: The result is a green rectangle that overlies a red rectangle of the same size.
trans-unit.target: 結果會是大小的綠色矩形，這個矩形相同的紅色矩形覆疊。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records in the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display at a specified point.
trans-unit.target: 將所指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 中的資料錄一次一筆地傳送至回呼方法，以便在指定的點上顯示。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: 要列舉的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structure that specifies the location of the upper-left corner of the drawn metafile.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 結構，指定所繪製中繼檔的左上角位置。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> 委派，指定中繼檔記錄被傳送至的方法。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records in the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display at a specified point.
trans-unit.target: 將所指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 中的資料錄一次一筆地傳送至回呼方法，以便在指定的點上顯示。

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。

trans-unit.source: Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每一筆記錄會個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the callback method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method to "play back", or draw, the record.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>來 「 播放 」，或繪製、 記錄方法。

trans-unit.source: If the callback method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>, it must do so by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method of the specific <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> that is being enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 如果回呼方法會呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必須這麼做藉由呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法的特定<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在列舉。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a form that has a <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> as one of its private members.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立的表單具有<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>做為其中一個私用成員。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%2A>, which calls the form's `MetafileCallback` method for each record in the metafile.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%2A>，呼叫表單的`MetafileCallback`中繼檔中的每一筆記錄的方法。

trans-unit.source: The `MetafileCallback` method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: `MetafileCallback` 方法會呼叫 <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the `MetafileCallback` method receives the record data as an <xref:System.IntPtr>, but the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method expects the record data to be a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，`MetafileCallback`方法會接收記錄資料，做為<xref:System.IntPtr>，但<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法預期的記錄資料的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The call to <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy%2A> copies the record data to a byte array so that it can be passed to <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy%2A>將記錄資料複製到位元組陣列，以便將它傳遞至<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: 要列舉的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of three <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures that define a parallelogram that determines the size and location of the drawn metafile.
trans-unit.target: 定義平行四邊型之三個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 結構的陣列，會決定所繪製中繼檔的大小和位置。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> 委派，指定中繼檔記錄被傳送至的方法。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records in the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 將所指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 中的資料錄一次一筆地傳送至回呼方法，以便在指定的平行四邊形中顯示。

trans-unit.target: 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。

trans-unit.source: Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每一筆記錄會個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the callback method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method to "play back", or draw, the record.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>來 「 播放 」，或繪製、 記錄方法。

trans-unit.source: If the callback method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>, it must do so by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method of the specific <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> that is being enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 如果回呼方法會呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必須這麼做藉由呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法的特定<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在列舉。

trans-unit.source: The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: `destPoints`參數會指定三個平行四邊形的點。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 三個<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>結構代表平行四邊形左上角、 右上角和左下角。

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 所繪製中繼檔是調整，而且修剪來符合平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>.

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 結構，指定所繪製中繼檔的位置和大小。

trans-unit.source: If the callback method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>, it must do so by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method of the specific <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> that is being enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 如果回呼方法會呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必須這麼做藉由呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法的特定<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在列舉。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records in the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display at a specified point.

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。

trans-unit.source: Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: 要列舉的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of three <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures that define a parallelogram that determines the size and location of the drawn metafile.
trans-unit.target: 定義平行四邊型之三個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 結構的陣列，會決定所繪製中繼檔的大小和位置。

trans-unit.source: Internal pointer that is required, but ignored.
trans-unit.target: 必要但被忽略的內部指標。

trans-unit.source: You can pass <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" /> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 您可以為這個參數傳入 <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" />。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records in the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 將所指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 中的資料錄一次一筆地傳送至回呼方法，以便在指定的平行四邊形中顯示。

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。

trans-unit.source: Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每一筆記錄會個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the callback method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method to "play back", or draw, the record.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>來 「 播放 」，或繪製、 記錄方法。

trans-unit.source: If the callback method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>, it must do so by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method of the specific <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> that is being enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 如果回呼方法會呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必須這麼做藉由呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法的特定<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在列舉。

trans-unit.source: The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: `destPoints`參數會指定三個平行四邊形的點。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 三個<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>結構代表平行四邊形左上角、 右上角和左下角。

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 所繪製中繼檔是調整，而且修剪來符合平行四邊形。

trans-unit.target: 如需程式碼範例，請參閱<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: 要列舉的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structure that specifies the location of the upper-left corner of the drawn metafile.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 結構，指定所繪製中繼檔的左上角位置。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that specifies the portion of the metafile, relative to its upper-left corner, to draw.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 結構，指定與其左上角相關且要繪製之中繼檔部分。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> enumeration that specifies the unit of measure used to determine the portion of the metafile that the rectangle specified by the <c>srcRect</c> parameter contains.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 列舉的成員，指定用來判斷由 <c>srcRect</c> 參數指定的矩形所包含之中繼檔部分的測量單位。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> 委派，指定中繼檔記錄被傳送至的方法。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records in a selected rectangle from a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display at a specified point.
trans-unit.target: 將所選取矩形中的資料錄從 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 一次一筆地傳送至回呼方法，以便在指定的點上顯示。

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。

trans-unit.source: Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每一筆記錄會個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the callback method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method to "play back", or draw, the record.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>來 「 播放 」，或繪製、 記錄方法。

trans-unit.source: If the callback method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>, it must do so by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method of the specific <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> that is being enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 如果回呼方法會呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必須這麼做藉由呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法的特定<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在列舉。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>.
trans-unit.target: 如需程式碼範例，請參閱<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: 要列舉的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of three <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures that define a parallelogram that determines the size and location of the drawn metafile.
trans-unit.target: 定義平行四邊型之三個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 結構的陣列，會決定所繪製中繼檔的大小和位置。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> 委派，指定中繼檔記錄被傳送至的方法。

trans-unit.source: Internal pointer that is required, but ignored.
trans-unit.target: 必要但被忽略的內部指標。

trans-unit.source: You can pass <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" /> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 您可以為這個參數傳入 <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> that specifies image attribute information for the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" />，指定所繪製影像的影像屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records in the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified parallelogram using specified image attributes.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 中的記錄一次一筆地傳送至回呼方法，以使用指定之影像屬性在指定的平行四邊形中顯示。

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。

trans-unit.source: Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每一筆記錄會個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the callback method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method to "play back", or draw, the record.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>來 「 播放 」，或繪製、 記錄方法。

trans-unit.source: If the callback method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>, it must do so by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method of the specific <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> that is being enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 如果回呼方法會呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必須這麼做藉由呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法的特定<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在列舉。

trans-unit.source: The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: `destPoints`參數會指定三個平行四邊形的點。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 三個<xref:System.Drawing.Point>結構代表平行四邊形左上角、 右上角和左下角。

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 所繪製中繼檔是調整，而且修剪來符合平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: The image attributes specified by the `imageAttr` parameter replace those specified when the metafile was written.
trans-unit.target: 指定的映像屬性`imageAttr`參數所指定中繼檔已寫入時的取代。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>.
trans-unit.target: 如需程式碼範例，請參閱<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: 要列舉的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> 委派，指定中繼檔記錄被傳送至的方法。

trans-unit.target: 每一筆記錄會個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。

trans-unit.target: 如果回呼方法會呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必須這麼做藉由呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法的特定<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在列舉。

trans-unit.source: The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: `destPoints`參數會指定三個平行四邊形的點。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 三個<xref:System.Drawing.Point>結構代表平行四邊形左上角、 右上角和左下角。

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 所繪製中繼檔是調整，而且修剪來符合平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 任何繪製發生外部所指定的矩形`srcRect`參數已忽略。

trans-unit.target: `destPoints`參數會指定三個平行四邊形的點。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 三個<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>結構代表平行四邊形左上角、 右上角和左下角。

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 所繪製中繼檔是調整，而且修剪來符合平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: The image attributes specified by the `imageAttr` parameter replace those specified when the metafile was written.
trans-unit.target: 指定的映像屬性`imageAttr`參數所指定中繼檔已寫入時的取代。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>.
trans-unit.target: 如需程式碼範例，請參閱<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: 要列舉的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of three <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures that define a parallelogram that determines the size and location of the drawn metafile.
trans-unit.target: 定義平行四邊型之三個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 結構的陣列，會決定所繪製中繼檔的大小和位置。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structures that specifies the portion of the metafile, relative to its upper-left corner, to draw.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 結構，指定與其左上角相關且要繪製之中繼檔部分。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> enumeration that specifies the unit of measure used to determine the portion of the metafile that the rectangle specified by the <c>srcRect</c> parameter contains.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 列舉的成員，指定用來判斷由 <c>srcRect</c> 參數指定的矩形所包含之中繼檔部分的測量單位。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> 委派，指定中繼檔記錄被傳送至的方法。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records in a selected rectangle from a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 將所選取矩形中的資料錄從 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 一次一筆地傳送至回呼方法，以便在指定的平行四邊形中顯示。

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。

trans-unit.source: Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每一筆記錄會個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the callback method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method to "play back", or draw, the record.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>來 「 播放 」，或繪製、 記錄方法。

trans-unit.source: If the callback method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>, it must do so by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method of the specific <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> that is being enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 如果回呼方法會呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必須這麼做藉由呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法的特定<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在列舉。

trans-unit.source: The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: `destPoints`參數會指定三個平行四邊形的點。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 三個<xref:System.Drawing.Point>結構代表平行四邊形左上角、 右上角和左下角。

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 所繪製中繼檔是調整，而且修剪來符合平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 任何繪製發生外部所指定的矩形`srcRect`參數已忽略。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>.
trans-unit.target: 如需程式碼範例，請參閱<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: 要列舉的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that specifies the location and size of the drawn metafile.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 結構，指定所繪製中繼檔的位置和大小。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> 委派，指定中繼檔記錄被傳送至的方法。

trans-unit.source: Internal pointer that is required, but ignored.
trans-unit.target: 必要但被忽略的內部指標。

trans-unit.source: You can pass <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" /> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 您可以為這個參數傳入 <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> that specifies image attribute information for the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" />，指定所繪製影像的影像屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records of the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified rectangle using specified image attributes.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 的記錄一次一筆地傳送至回呼方法，以使用指定之影像屬性在指定的矩形中顯示。

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。

trans-unit.source: Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter.

trans-unit.target: 如果回呼方法會呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必須這麼做藉由呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法的特定<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在列舉。

trans-unit.target: 指定的映像屬性`imageAttr`參數所指定中繼檔已寫入時的取代。

trans-unit.target: 如果回呼方法會呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必須這麼做藉由呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法的特定<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在列舉。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>.
trans-unit.target: 如需程式碼範例，請參閱<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: 要列舉的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of three <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures that define a parallelogram that determines the size and location of the drawn metafile.
trans-unit.target: 定義平行四邊型之三個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 結構的陣列，會決定所繪製中繼檔的大小和位置。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that specifies the portion of the metafile, relative to its upper-left corner, to draw.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 結構，指定與其左上角相關且要繪製之中繼檔部分。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> enumeration that specifies the unit of measure used to determine the portion of the metafile that the rectangle specified by the <c>srcRect</c> parameter contains.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 列舉的成員，指定用來判斷由 <c>srcRect</c> 參數指定的矩形所包含之中繼檔部分的測量單位。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> 委派，指定中繼檔記錄被傳送至的方法。

trans-unit.source: Internal pointer that is required, but ignored.
trans-unit.target: 必要但被忽略的內部指標。

trans-unit.source: You can pass <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" /> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 您可以為這個參數傳入 <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" />。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records in a selected rectangle from a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 將所選取矩形中的資料錄從 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 一次一筆地傳送至回呼方法，以便在指定的平行四邊形中顯示。

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。

trans-unit.source: Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每一筆記錄會個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the callback method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method to "play back", or draw, the record.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>來 「 播放 」，或繪製、 記錄方法。

trans-unit.source: If the callback method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>, it must do so by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method of the specific <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> that is being enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 如果回呼方法會呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必須這麼做藉由呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法的特定<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在列舉。

trans-unit.source: The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: `destPoints`參數會指定三個平行四邊形的點。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 三個<xref:System.Drawing.Point>結構代表平行四邊形左上角、 右上角和左下角。

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 所繪製中繼檔是調整，而且修剪來符合平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 任何繪製發生外部所指定的矩形`srcRect`參數已忽略。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>.
trans-unit.target: 如需程式碼範例，請參閱<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: 要列舉的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure that specifies the location of the upper-left corner of the drawn metafile.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 結構，指定所繪製中繼檔的左上角位置。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure that specifies the portion of the metafile, relative to its upper-left corner, to draw.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 結構，指定與其左上角相關且要繪製之中繼檔部分。

trans-unit.target: 您可以為這個參數傳入 <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" />。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records in a selected rectangle from a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display at a specified point.
trans-unit.target: 將所選取矩形中的資料錄從 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 一次一筆地傳送至回呼方法，以便在指定的點上顯示。

trans-unit.target: 如果回呼方法會呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必須這麼做藉由呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法的特定<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在列舉。

trans-unit.source: Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 任何繪製發生外部所指定的矩形`srcRect`參數已忽略。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>.

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 結構，指定與其左上角相關且要繪製之中繼檔部分。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> enumeration that specifies the unit of measure used to determine the portion of the metafile that the rectangle specified by the <c>srcRect</c> parameter contains.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 列舉的成員，指定用來判斷由 <c>srcRect</c> 參數指定的矩形所包含之中繼檔部分的測量單位。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> 委派，指定中繼檔記錄被傳送至的方法。

trans-unit.source: Internal pointer that is required, but ignored.
trans-unit.target: 必要但被忽略的內部指標。

trans-unit.source: You can pass <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" /> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 您可以為這個參數傳入 <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> that specifies image attribute information for the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" />，指定所繪製影像的影像屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records in a selected rectangle from a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display at a specified point using specified image attributes.
trans-unit.target: 將選取之矩形中的記錄從 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 一次一筆地傳送至回呼方法，以使用指定之影像屬性在指定的點上顯示。

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。

trans-unit.source: Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每一筆記錄會個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the callback method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method to "play back", or draw, the record.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>來 「 播放 」，或繪製、 記錄方法。

trans-unit.source: If the callback method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>, it must do so by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method of the specific <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> that is being enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 如果回呼方法會呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必須這麼做藉由呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法的特定<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在列舉。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>.
trans-unit.target: 如需程式碼範例，請參閱<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: 要列舉的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />。

trans-unit.source: Array of three <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structures that define a parallelogram that determines the size and location of the drawn metafile.
trans-unit.target: 定義平行四邊型之三個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 結構的陣列，會決定所繪製中繼檔的大小和位置。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that specifies the portion of the metafile, relative to its upper-left corner, to draw.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 結構，指定與其左上角相關且要繪製之中繼檔部分。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> enumeration that specifies the unit of measure used to determine the portion of the metafile that the rectangle specified by the <c>srcRect</c> parameter contains.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 列舉的成員，指定用來判斷由 <c>srcRect</c> 參數指定的矩形所包含之中繼檔部分的測量單位。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> 委派，指定中繼檔記錄被傳送至的方法。

trans-unit.source: Internal pointer that is required, but ignored.
trans-unit.target: 必要但被忽略的內部指標。

trans-unit.source: You can pass <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" /> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 您可以為這個參數傳入 <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> that specifies image attribute information for the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" />，指定所繪製影像的影像屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: Sends the records in a selected rectangle from a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />, one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified parallelogram using specified image attributes.
trans-unit.target: 將選取之矩形中的記錄從 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> 一次一筆地傳送至回呼方法，以使用指定之影像屬性在指定的平行四邊形中顯示。

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。

trans-unit.source: Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每一筆記錄會個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the callback method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method to "play back", or draw, the record.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>來 「 播放 」，或繪製、 記錄方法。

trans-unit.source: If the callback method calls <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>, it must do so by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method of the specific <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> that is being enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 如果回呼方法會呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>，它必須這麼做藉由呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A>方法的特定<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>正在列舉。

trans-unit.source: The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: `destPoints`參數會指定三個平行四邊形的點。

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 三個<xref:System.Drawing.Point>結構代表平行四邊形左上角、 右上角和左下角。

trans-unit.source: The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 所繪製中繼檔是調整，而且修剪來符合平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 任何繪製發生外部所指定的矩形`srcRect`參數已忽略。

trans-unit.source: The image attributes specified by the `imageAttr` parameter replace those specified when the metafile was written.
trans-unit.target: 指定的映像屬性`imageAttr`參數所指定中繼檔已寫入時的取代。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>.
trans-unit.target: 如需程式碼範例，請參閱<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile%28System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc%29>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" /> to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: 要列舉的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile" />。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 結構，指定所繪製中繼檔的左上角位置。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure that specifies the portion of the metafile, relative to its upper-left corner, to draw.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 結構，指定與其左上角相關且要繪製之中繼檔部分。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 列舉的成員，指定用來判斷由 <c>srcRect</c> 參數指定的矩形所包含之中繼檔部分的測量單位。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc" /> 委派，指定中繼檔記錄被傳送至的方法。

trans-unit.target: 必要但被忽略的內部指標。

trans-unit.target: 您可以為這個參數傳入 <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" />。
