trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangular clipping region and sets it as the clipping region for the graphics object of the form using <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CombineMode.Replace>.
trans-unit.target: 建立矩形的裁剪區域，並將它設定為使用表單的圖形物件的裁剪區域<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CombineMode.Replace>。

trans-unit.source: Creates the location and size of two rectangles, one inside the clipping region and one outside.
trans-unit.target: 位置和大小的兩個矩形的裁剪區域內，一個外部建立。

trans-unit.source: Tests each of the rectangles for visibility and draws only the visible one.
trans-unit.target: 測試每個矩形的可見性，且只繪製可見。

trans-unit.source: The result is one small red rectangle, which is within the clip region.
trans-unit.target: 結果是一個小紅色矩形中的裁剪區域。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle to test for visibility.
trans-unit.target: 要測試可視性之矩形左上角的 X 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle to test for visibility.
trans-unit.target: 要測試可視性之矩形左上角的 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: Width of the rectangle to test for visibility.
trans-unit.target: 要測試可視性之矩形的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Height of the rectangle to test for visibility.
trans-unit.target: 要測試可視性之矩形的高度。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the rectangle specified by a pair of coordinates, a width, and a height is contained within the visible clip region of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: 指出由一對座標、寬度和高度指定的矩形，是否包含在這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的可見裁剪區域中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the rectangle defined by the <paramref name="x" />, <paramref name="y" />, <paramref name="width" />, and <paramref name="height" /> parameters is contained within the visible clip region of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="x" />、<paramref name="y" />、<paramref name="width" /> 和 <paramref name="height" /> 參數所定義之矩形包含在這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的可見裁剪區域中，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangular clipping region and sets it as the clipping region for the graphics object of the form using <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CombineMode.Replace>.
trans-unit.target: 建立矩形的裁剪區域，並將它設定為使用表單的圖形物件的裁剪區域<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CombineMode.Replace>。

trans-unit.source: Creates the location and size of two rectangles, one inside the clipping region and one outside.
trans-unit.target: 位置和大小的兩個矩形的裁剪區域內，一個外部建立。

trans-unit.source: Tests each of the rectangles for visibility and draws only the visible one.
trans-unit.target: 測試每個矩形的可見性，且只繪製可見。

trans-unit.source: The result is one small red rectangle, which is within the clip region.
trans-unit.target: 結果是一個小紅色矩形中的裁剪區域。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the visible clipping region of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> is empty.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的可見裁剪區域是否為空的。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the visible portion of the clipping region of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> is empty; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 之裁剪區域的可見部分是空的，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The visible clipping region is the intersection of the clipping region of this `Graphics` and the clipping region of the window.
trans-unit.target: 之可見裁剪區域是這樣的裁剪區域的交集`Graphics`和視窗的裁剪區域。

trans-unit.source: String to measure.
trans-unit.target: 要測量的字串。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> that defines the text format of the string.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />，定義字串的文字格式。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure that specifies the layout rectangle for the string.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 結構，指定字串的配置矩形。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.StringFormat" /> that represents formatting information, such as line spacing, for the string.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.StringFormat" />，表示字串的格式設定資訊，例如行距。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> objects, each of which bounds a range of character positions within the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 物件的陣列，每個陣列框住指定字串中字元位置的範圍。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> objects, each of which bounds a range of character positions within the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 物件的陣列，每個物件框住指定字串中字元位置的範圍。

trans-unit.source: The regions returned by this method are resolution-dependent, so there might be a slight loss of accuracy if strings are recorded in a metafile at one resolution and later played back at a different resolution.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所傳回的區域是精確度的解析度而定，因此可能會有些微遺失如果字串是精確度的一種解析度中繼檔中記錄，而且稍後播放不同解析度。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Sets a string "First and Second ranges" and a font for display of the string ("Times New Roman", 16 point).
trans-unit.target: 設定字串 「 第一個和第二個範圍"和顯示字串 ("Times New Roman"，16 點) 的字型。

trans-unit.source: Sets two character ranges within the string (which correspond to the words "First" and "Second").
trans-unit.target: 設定兩個字元的字串內的範圍 （其對應的單字"第一次 」 和 「 第二個"）。

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle in which to display the string.
trans-unit.target: 建立要在其中顯示字串的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Sets the formatting of the string ¾ including the two character ranges.
trans-unit.target: 設定字串 ¾ 包括兩個字元範圍的格式。

trans-unit.source: Draws the string to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 將字串繪製到螢幕。

trans-unit.source: Measures the character ranges, determines rectangles that bound the two specified ranges.
trans-unit.target: 測量的字元範圍，會決定繫結兩個指定之範圍的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Draws the two rectangles to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 將兩個矩形繪製到螢幕。

trans-unit.source: The result is the displayed string with the first range ("First") bounded by a red rectangle and the second range ("Second") bounded by a blue rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 結果是顯示的字串 （"第一次 」） 以紅色矩形所限定的第一個範圍與第二個 （「 第二個"） 以藍色矩形所限定的範圍。

trans-unit.source: Measures the specified string when drawn with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 物件繪製時，測量指定的字串。

trans-unit.source: String to measure.
trans-unit.target: 要測量的字串。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> that defines the text format of the string.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />，定義字串的文字格式。

trans-unit.source: Measures the specified string when drawn with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 物件繪製時，測量指定的字串。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure that represents the size, in the units specified by the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit" /> property, of the string specified by the <paramref name="text" /> parameter as drawn with the <paramref name="font" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> 結構，表示 <paramref name="text" /> 參數所指定的字串以 <paramref name="font" /> 參數繪製時的大小，而使用的單位是由 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit" /> 屬性所指定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> method is designed for use with individual strings and includes a small amount of extra space before and after the string to allow for overhanging glyphs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>方法專為搭配個別字串和之前和之後要允許突出圖像 （glyph） 的字串，包含少量的額外空間設計。

trans-unit.source: Also, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> method adjusts glyph points to optimize display quality and might display a string narrower than reported by <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>方法調整字符點以最佳化顯示品質，並可能顯示比所報告的窄字串<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A> method or one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> methods that takes a <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>, and pass <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 取得度量資訊適用於配置 （例如，實作格式化的文字） 中的相鄰字串，請使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>方法或其中一個<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>方法，取得<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>，並傳遞<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Also, ensure the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A> for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint.AntiAlias>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，請確定<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A>如<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>是<xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint.AntiAlias>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a string to measure.
trans-unit.target: 建立要測量的字串。

trans-unit.source: Creates a font object and sets it to Arial (16 point).
trans-unit.target: 建立字型物件，並將其設為新細明體 （16 點）。

trans-unit.source: Creates a size object and uses it and the font object to measure the size of the string.
trans-unit.target: 建立的大小物件並使用它和字型物件來測量字串的大小。

trans-unit.source: Draws a red rectangle using the measured size of the string.
trans-unit.target: 繪製使用測量字串的大小以紅色矩形。

trans-unit.source: Draws the string within the drawn rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 繪製所繪製的矩形內的字串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="font" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="font" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: String to measure.
trans-unit.target: 要測量的字串。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> defines the text format of the string.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />，定義字串的文字格式。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure that specifies the maximum layout area for the text.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> 結構，指定文字的最大配置區域。

trans-unit.source: Measures the specified string when drawn with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> within the specified layout area.
trans-unit.target: 在指定之配置區域中使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 繪製時，測量指定的字串。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure that represents the size, in the units specified by the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit" /> property, of the string specified by the <paramref name="text" /> parameter as drawn with the <paramref name="font" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> 結構，表示 <paramref name="text" /> 參數所指定的字串以 <paramref name="font" /> 參數繪製時的大小，而使用的單位是由 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit" /> 屬性所指定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> method is designed for use with individual strings and includes a small amount of extra space before and after the string to allow for overhanging glyphs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>方法專為搭配個別字串和之前和之後要允許突出圖像 （glyph） 的字串，包含少量的額外空間設計。

trans-unit.source: Also, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> method adjusts glyph points to optimize display quality and might display a string narrower than reported by <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>方法調整字符點以最佳化顯示品質，並可能顯示比所報告的窄字串<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A> method or one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> methods that takes a <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>, and pass <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 取得度量資訊適用於配置 （例如，實作格式化的文字） 中的相鄰字串，請使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>方法或其中一個<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>方法，取得<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>，並傳遞<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Also, ensure the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A> for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint.AntiAlias>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，請確定<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A>如<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>是<xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint.AntiAlias>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a string to measure and a font object set to Arial (16 point).
trans-unit.target: 建立要測量的字串和新細明體 （16 點） 設定的字型物件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum layout size of the string.
trans-unit.target: 設定字串的最大的配置大小。

trans-unit.source: Creates a size object and uses it, the font object, and the maximum layout size to measure the size of the string.
trans-unit.target: 建立的大小物件，並用於測量字串的大小、 字型物件和最大的配置大小。

trans-unit.source: Draws a red rectangle using the measured size of the string.
trans-unit.target: 繪製使用測量字串的大小以紅色矩形。

trans-unit.source: Draws the string within the drawn rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 繪製所繪製的矩形內的字串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="font" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="font" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: String to measure.
trans-unit.target: 要測量的字串。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> that defines the format of the string.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />，定義字串的格式。

trans-unit.source: Maximum width of the string in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 字串的最大寬度，以像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: Measures the specified string when drawn with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 物件繪製時，測量指定的字串。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure that represents the size, in the units specified by the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit" /> property, of the string specified in the <paramref name="text" /> parameter as drawn with the <paramref name="font" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> 結構，表示 <paramref name="text" /> 參數中所指定的字串以 <paramref name="font" /> 參數繪製時的大小，而使用的單位是由 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit" /> 屬性所指定。

trans-unit.source: The `width` parameter specifies the maximum value of the width component of the returned <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF> structure (<xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A>).
trans-unit.target: `width`參數指定的寬度元件所傳回的最大值<xref:System.Drawing.SizeF>結構 (<xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: If the `width` parameter is less than the actual width of the string, the returned <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> component is truncated to a value representing the maximum number of characters that will fit within the specified width.
trans-unit.target: 如果`width`參數是字串，傳回的實際寬度小於<xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A>元件就會截斷為代表符合指定的寬度的字元的數目上限的值。

trans-unit.source: To accommodate the entire string, the returned <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> component is adjusted to a value that allows displaying the string with character wrap.
trans-unit.target: 若要容納整個字串，傳回的<xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A>元件會調整為可讓顯示的字串字元換行的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> method is designed for use with individual strings and includes a small amount of extra space before and after the string to allow for overhanging glyphs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>方法專為搭配個別字串和之前和之後要允許突出圖像 （glyph） 的字串，包含少量的額外空間設計。

trans-unit.source: Also, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> method adjusts glyph points to optimize display quality and might display a string narrower than reported by <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>方法調整字符點以最佳化顯示品質，並可能顯示比所報告的窄字串<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A> method or one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> methods that takes a <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>, and pass <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 取得度量資訊適用於配置 （例如，實作格式化的文字） 中的相鄰字串，請使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>方法或其中一個<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>方法，取得<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>，並傳遞<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Also, ensure the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A> for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint.AntiAlias>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，請確定<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A>如<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>是<xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint.AntiAlias>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a string to measure and a font object set to Arial (16 point).
trans-unit.target: 建立要測量的字串和新細明體 （16 點） 設定的字型物件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum width of the string.
trans-unit.target: 設定字串的最大寬度。

trans-unit.source: Creates a size object and uses it, the font object, and the maximum string width to measure the size of the string.
trans-unit.target: 建立的大小物件，並用於測量字串的大小、 字型物件和字串的最大寬度。

trans-unit.source: Draws a red rectangle using the measured size of the string.
trans-unit.target: 繪製使用測量字串的大小以紅色矩形。

trans-unit.source: Draws the string within the drawn rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 繪製所繪製的矩形內的字串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="font" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="font" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: String to measure.
trans-unit.target: 要測量的字串。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> defines the text format of the string.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />，定義字串的文字格式。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure that represents the upper-left corner of the string.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 結構，表示字串的左上角。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.StringFormat" /> that represents formatting information, such as line spacing, for the string.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.StringFormat" />，表示字串的格式設定資訊，例如行距。

trans-unit.source: Measures the specified string when drawn with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> and formatted with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.StringFormat" />.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 繪製並以指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.StringFormat" /> 設定格式時，測量指定的字串。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure that represents the size, in the units specified by the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit" /> property, of the string specified by the <paramref name="text" /> parameter as drawn with the <paramref name="font" /> parameter and the <paramref name="stringFormat" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> 結構，表示 <paramref name="text" /> 參數所指定的字串以 <paramref name="font" /> 參數和 <paramref name="stringFormat" /> 參數繪製時的大小，而使用的單位是由 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit" /> 屬性所指定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> method is designed for use with individual strings and includes a small amount of extra space before and after the string to allow for overhanging glyphs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>方法專為搭配個別字串和之前和之後要允許突出圖像 （glyph） 的字串，包含少量的額外空間設計。

trans-unit.source: Also, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> method adjusts glyph points to optimize display quality and might display a string narrower than reported by <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>方法調整字符點以最佳化顯示品質，並可能顯示比所報告的窄字串<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A> method or one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> methods that takes a <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>, and pass <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 取得度量資訊適用於配置 （例如，實作格式化的文字） 中的相鄰字串，請使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>方法或其中一個<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>方法，取得<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>，並傳遞<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Also, ensure the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A> for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint.AntiAlias>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，請確定<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A>如<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>是<xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint.AntiAlias>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a string to measure and a font object set to Arial (16 point)
trans-unit.target: 建立要測量的字串和新細明體 （16 點） 設定的字型物件

trans-unit.source: Creates a point to locate the upper-left corner of the string.
trans-unit.target: 建立要尋找之字串的左上角的點。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string format object and sets its format flags to <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags.DirectionVertical>.
trans-unit.target: 建立物件的字串格式，並將它的格式旗標設定為<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags.DirectionVertical>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a size object to measure the string.
trans-unit.target: 建立以測量字串的大小物件。

trans-unit.source: Measures the size of the string, using the string, the font object, the locating point, and the string format.
trans-unit.target: 測量使用字串、 字型物件、 放置的點和字串格式，在字串的大小。

trans-unit.source: Draws a red rectangle using the locating point and the measured size of the string.
trans-unit.target: 繪製使用放置點和測量字串的大小以紅色矩形。

trans-unit.source: Draws the string within the drawn rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 繪製所繪製的矩形內的字串。

trans-unit.source: The result is a vertical rectangle enclosing a vertical string.
trans-unit.target: 結果是垂直矩形封入垂直的字串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="font" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="font" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: String to measure.
trans-unit.target: 要測量的字串。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> defines the text format of the string.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />，定義字串的文字格式。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure that specifies the maximum layout area for the text.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> 結構，指定文字的最大配置區域。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.StringFormat" /> that represents formatting information, such as line spacing, for the string.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.StringFormat" />，表示字串的格式設定資訊，例如行距。

trans-unit.source: Measures the specified string when drawn with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> and formatted with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.StringFormat" />.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 繪製並以指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.StringFormat" /> 設定格式時，測量指定的字串。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure that represents the size, in the units specified by the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit" /> property, of the string specified in the <paramref name="text" /> parameter as drawn with the <paramref name="font" /> parameter and the <paramref name="stringFormat" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> 結構，表示 <paramref name="text" /> 參數中所指定的字串以 <paramref name="font" /> 參數和 <paramref name="stringFormat" /> 參數繪製時的大小，而使用的單位是由 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit" /> 屬性所指定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> method is designed for use with individual strings and includes a small amount of extra space before and after the string to allow for overhanging glyphs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>方法專為搭配個別字串和之前和之後要允許突出圖像 （glyph） 的字串，包含少量的額外空間設計。

trans-unit.source: Also, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> method adjusts glyph points to optimize display quality and might display a string narrower than reported by <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>方法調整字符點以最佳化顯示品質，並可能顯示比所報告的窄字串<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A> method or one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> methods that takes a <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>, and pass <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 取得度量資訊適用於配置 （例如，實作格式化的文字） 中的相鄰字串，請使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>方法或其中一個<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>方法，取得<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>，並傳遞<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Also, ensure the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A> for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint.AntiAlias>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，請確定<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A>如<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>是<xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint.AntiAlias>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a string to measure and a font object set to Arial (16 point)
trans-unit.target: 建立要測量的字串和新細明體 （16 點） 設定的字型物件

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum layout size of the string.
trans-unit.target: 設定字串的最大的配置大小。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string format object and sets its format flags to <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags.DirectionVertical>.
trans-unit.target: 建立物件的字串格式，並將它的格式旗標設定為<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags.DirectionVertical>。

trans-unit.source: Creates the integer variables `charactersFitted` and `linesFilled` and a size object to measure the string.
trans-unit.target: 會建立整數變數`charactersFitted`和`linesFilled`和大小的物件，以量值的字串。

trans-unit.source: Measures the size of the string and determines the number of characters fitted and lines filled, using the string, the font object, the maximum layout size, and the string format.
trans-unit.target: 字串的大小，並決定的字元數和填滿，使用字串、 字型物件、 最大配置大小和字串格式的行數。

trans-unit.source: Draws a red rectangle using the measured size of the string.
trans-unit.target: 繪製使用測量字串的大小以紅色矩形。

trans-unit.source: Draws the string within the drawn rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 繪製所繪製的矩形內的字串。

trans-unit.source: Draws the values of the number of characters fitted and lines filled.
trans-unit.target: 繪製的字元數和填滿的行數的值。

trans-unit.source: The result is a vertical rectangle enclosing a vertical string.
trans-unit.target: 結果是垂直矩形封入垂直的字串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="font" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="font" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the world transformation of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> and specified the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 將這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的自然變換和指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 物件相乘。

trans-unit.source: 4x4 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> that multiplies the world transformation.
trans-unit.target: 乘以自然變換的 4x4 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />。

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the world transformation of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> and specified the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 將這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的自然變換和指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 物件相乘。

trans-unit.source: This method prepends the matrix specified by the `matrix` parameter, so that the result is `matrix` x world transformation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的前面加上所指定的矩陣`matrix`參數，使結果`matrix`x 全局轉換。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a `transformMatrix` matrix (a two by two identity matrix plus a zero-translation vector).
trans-unit.target: 建立`transformMatrix`矩陣 （兩個由兩個身分識別矩陣，加上零轉譯向量）。

trans-unit.source: Translates the transform matrix by a vector (200, 100).
trans-unit.target: 轉換的向量 （200，100） 的轉換矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Rotates the world transformation matrix of the Windows Form by 30 degrees, prepends the rotation matrix for 30 degrees to the form's transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 30 度旋轉的 Windows Form 的自然變換矩陣，前面加上 30 度表單的轉換矩陣的旋轉矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the rotated world transformation matrix by the translated `transformMatrix`, and prepends the `transformMatrix` to the world transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 旋轉的自然變換矩陣乘以翻譯`transformMatrix`，和前面加上`transformMatrix`至的自然變換矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Draws a rotated, translated ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 繪製旋轉、 轉換的橢圓形。

trans-unit.source: 4x4 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> that multiplies the world transformation.
trans-unit.target: 乘以自然變換的 4x4 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder" /> enumeration that determines the order of the multiplication.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder" /> 列舉的成員，決定相乘的順序。

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the world transformation of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> and specified the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: 將這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的自然變換和指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 以指定的順序相乘。

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder.Prepend> for the `order` parameter specifies that the order of the multiplication is `matrix` x world transformation.
trans-unit.target: 值為<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder.Prepend>如`order`參數指定的順序相乘的`matrix`x 全局轉換。

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder.Append> for `order` specifies that the order of the multiplication is world transformation x `matrix`.
trans-unit.target: 值為<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder.Append>如`order`指定相乘的順序是全局轉換 x `matrix`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a `transformMatrix` matrix (a two by two identity matrix plus a zero-translation vector).
trans-unit.target: 建立`transformMatrix`矩陣 （兩個由兩個身分識別矩陣，加上零轉譯向量）。

trans-unit.source: Translates the transform matrix by a vector (200, 100).
trans-unit.target: 轉換的向量 （200，100） 的轉換矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Rotates the world transformation matrix of the Windows Form by 30 degrees, prepending the rotation matrix for 30 degrees to the form's transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將 Windows form 的自然變換矩陣旋轉 30 度，前面加上 30 度表單的轉換矩陣的旋轉矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the rotated world transformation matrix by the translated `transformMatrix`, appending the `transformMatrix` to the world transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 旋轉的自然變換矩陣乘以翻譯`transformMatrix`、 附加`transformMatrix`至的自然變換矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Draws a rotated, translated ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 繪製旋轉、 轉換的橢圓形。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the scaling between world units and page units for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的自然單位和畫面單位之間的縮放。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies a value for the scaling between world units and page units for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性指定這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的自然單位和畫面單位之間的縮放值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TranslateTransform%2A> members to change the scale and origin when you draw a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TranslateTransform%2A>成員能夠變更的小數位數和來源，當您繪製矩形。

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into a form and call the `ChangePageScaleAndTranslateTransform` method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`ChangePageScaleAndTranslateTransform`方法時處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件，將傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unit of measure used for page coordinates in this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 中畫面座標使用的測量單位。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> values other than <see cref="F:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit.World" />.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit" /> 值，<see cref="F:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit.World" /> 除外。

trans-unit.source: The graphics unit is the unit of measure used for page coordinates in this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>.
trans-unit.target: 在圖形單元會在這個畫面座標使用的測量單位<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the effect of changing the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何變更的效果<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into a form and call the `ChangePageUnit` method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`ChangePageUnit`方法時處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件，將傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit" /> is set to <see cref="F:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit.World" />, which is not a physical unit.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit" /> 設定為 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit.World" />，這個值不是實體單位。

trans-unit.source: Gets or set a value specifying how pixels are offset during rendering of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定在這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的呈現期間如何位移像素。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies a member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PixelOffsetMode" /> enumeration
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PixelOffsetMode" /> 列舉的成員。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify either higher quality, slower rendering, or lower quality, faster rendering of the contents of this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來指定這個內容的其中一個較高品質、 速度較慢的呈現方式或較低的品質、 更快速呈現<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>物件。

trans-unit.source: Releases a device context handle obtained by a previous call to the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc" /> method of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放由先前呼叫這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc" /> 方法所取得的裝置內容控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Releases a device context handle obtained by a previous call to the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc" /> method of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放由先前呼叫這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc" /> 方法所取得的裝置內容控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A> are two methods that allow you to get and release the handle for a Windows device.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A> 和<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A>兩種方法可讓您取得和釋放控制代碼的 Windows 裝置。

trans-unit.source: You should always follow a call to <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A> with a call to <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A> when you are finished with the Windows handle.
trans-unit.target: 您應永遠遵循呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A>完畢時使用的 Windows 控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用於存取 unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 相關的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: Handle to a device context obtained by a previous call to the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc" /> method of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: 藉由先前呼叫這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 之 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc" /> 方法所取得的裝置內容控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Releases a device context handle obtained by a previous call to the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc" /> method of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放由先前呼叫這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc" /> 方法所取得的裝置內容控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The device context is a Windows structure based on [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] that defines a set of graphical objects and their associated attributes, as well as the graphical modes that affect output.
trans-unit.target: 裝置內容是根據 Windows 結構[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]，定義一組圖形物件和其相關聯的屬性，以及會影響輸出的圖形化模式。

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A> methods must appear in pairs.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A>方法必須出現在配對中。

trans-unit.source: During the scope of a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A> method pair, you usually make calls only to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] functions.
trans-unit.target: 在範圍期間<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A>方法組，您通常進行呼叫只[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函式。

trans-unit.source: Calls in that scope made to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] methods of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that produced the `hdc` parameter fail with an `ObjectBusy` error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫，範圍對[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]方法<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>產生`hdc`參數失敗，並`ObjectBusy`錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Also, [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] ignores any state changes made to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> of the `hdc` parameter in subsequent operations.
trans-unit.target: 此外，[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]會忽略所做的狀態變更<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>的`hdc`後續作業中的參數。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The example illustrates calling a Windows [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] function to perform the same task as a [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> method.
trans-unit.target: 本範例會示範呼叫 Windows[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函式來執行相同的工作[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>方法。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Defines the interoperability <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute> attribute for the Windows DLL file gdi32.dll.
trans-unit.target: 定義互通性<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute>Windows DLL 檔案 gdi32.dll 的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This DLL contains the desired [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] function, and it defines the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> function in that DLL as external.
trans-unit.target: 此 DLL 包含所需[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函式，所以它定義<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>為外部 DLL 中的函式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a red pen.
trans-unit.target: 建立紅色畫筆。

trans-unit.source: With the pen, draws a rectangle to the screen using the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawRectangle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用畫筆繪製矩形螢幕使用[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawRectangle%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Defines an internal pointer type variable `hdc` and sets its value to the handle to the device context of the form.
trans-unit.target: 定義的內部指標類型變數`hdc`並將其值設定為表單的裝置內容控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Draws a rectangle to the screen using the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> function.
trans-unit.target: 繪製矩形螢幕使用[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>函式。

trans-unit.source: Releases the device context represented by the `hdc` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 釋放裝置內容所表示`hdc`參數。

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用於存取 unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 相關的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: Handle to a device context.
trans-unit.target: 裝置內容的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Releases a handle to a device context.
trans-unit.target: 釋放裝置內容的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用於存取 unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 相關的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rendering origin of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> for dithering and for hatch brushes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個用於遞色和交錯線筆刷之 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的呈現原點。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structure that represents the dither origin for 8-bits-per-pixel and 16-bits-per-pixel dithering and is also used to set the origin for hatch brushes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 結構，表示每像素 8 位元和每像素 16 位元之遞色處理的遞色原點，並且用來設定交錯線筆刷的原點。

trans-unit.source: Resets the clip region of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to an infinite region.
trans-unit.target: 將這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的裁剪區域重設為無限區域。

trans-unit.source: When the clipping region of a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is infinite, items that this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> draws are not clipped.
trans-unit.target: 當的裁剪區域<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>為無限，這個項目<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>繪製並未被截斷。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle with upper-left corner at (0, 0) and sets the clipping region to this rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 建立矩形左上角，在 （0，0） 和設定這個矩形的裁剪區域。

trans-unit.source: Creates a second rectangle with upper-left corner at (100, 100) and sets the clipping region to the intersection of this rectangle and the current clipping region (the first rectangle).
trans-unit.target: 建立第二個矩形左上角，在 （100，100） 並將裁剪區域設定為目前裁剪區域 （第一個矩形） 這個矩形的交集。

trans-unit.source: Fills a large rectangle that includes both previous rectangles with a solid blue brush.
trans-unit.target: 填滿包含實心藍色筆刷與前的兩個矩形的大矩形。

trans-unit.source: Resets the clipping region to infinite.
trans-unit.target: 將裁剪區域重設為無限。

trans-unit.source: Draws rectangles around the two clipping regions; it uses a black pen for the first clipping rectangle and a red pen for the second clipping region.
trans-unit.target: 兩個裁剪區域; 周圍繪製矩形它會使用黑色畫筆裁剪方框第一個和第二個的裁剪區域的紅色畫筆。

trans-unit.source: The result is that only the intersection of the two rectangles is filled with blue.
trans-unit.target: 結果是兩個矩形的交集會填滿藍色。

trans-unit.source: Resets the world transformation matrix of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to the identity matrix.
trans-unit.target: 將這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的自然變換矩陣重設為識別矩陣。

trans-unit.source: The identity matrix represents a transformation with no scaling, rotation, or translation.
trans-unit.target: 矩陣表示沒有縮放、 旋轉或轉移轉換。

trans-unit.source: Resetting the world transformation of this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to the identity matrix means that its world transformation does not change the geometry of transformed items.
trans-unit.target: 重設這的自然變換<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>為識別矩陣表示其全局轉換不會變更之幾何的已轉換的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Translates the world transform of the Windows Form by a vector (100, 0).
trans-unit.target: 將 Windows Form 的自然變換轉譯向量 （100，0）。

trans-unit.source: Saves the graphics state of the form.
trans-unit.target: 儲存表單的圖形狀態。

trans-unit.source: Resets the world transform of the form to an identity and fills a rectangle with a solid red brush.
trans-unit.target: 重設為識別表單的自然變換和與實心的紅色筆刷填滿的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Restores the translated graphics state and fills a rectangle with a solid blue brush.
trans-unit.target: 還原已轉換的圖形狀態，並使用純色藍色筆刷填滿的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The result is an untranslated red-filled rectangle and a translated blue-filled rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 結果是未轉譯的紅色填滿的矩形，翻譯的藍色填滿的矩形。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState" /> that represents the state to which to restore this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState" />，表示要用來還原這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Restores the state of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to the state represented by a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState" />.
trans-unit.target: 將這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的狀態，還原成 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState" /> 所代表的狀態。

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, an information block that holds the state of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is put on a stack.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>，保留狀態的資訊區塊<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>放在堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> that identifies that information block.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>可識別該資訊區塊。

trans-unit.source: When you pass the identifying <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to the state it was in at the time of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞時，用來識別<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>至<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>方法，資訊區塊會從堆疊移除，且用來還原<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>的時間當時的狀態<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> returned by a given call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method can be passed only once to the `Restore` method.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>給定呼叫所傳回的<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法可以一次傳遞至`Restore`方法。

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method can be nested; that is, you can call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method several times before you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法可以巢狀結構; 也就是說，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法多次，才能呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Each time you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> for the information block.
trans-unit.target: 每次呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法，一個資訊區塊會放在堆疊上，而且您收到<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>資訊區塊。

trans-unit.source: When you pass one of those objects to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is returned to the state it was in at the time of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call that returned that particular <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞時，這些物件的其中一個<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>方法，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>回復成的時間當時的狀態<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法呼叫傳回的特定<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>。

trans-unit.source: The information block placed on the stack by that <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call are also removed.
trans-unit.target: 資訊區塊放置在堆疊上的<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法呼叫會從堆疊移除，且之後的所有資訊區塊放都置於該堆疊上<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法呼叫也會移除。

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>相同呼叫堆疊上方法的位置資訊區塊<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Just as a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> call, a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: 就像<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>呼叫搭配<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>呼叫，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法呼叫搭配<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法或由<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法) 之後的對應呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法會從堆疊移除。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, when you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，當您呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法或由<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法) 之後的對應呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法會從堆疊移除。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Translates the world transform of the Windows Form by a vector (100, 0).
trans-unit.target: 將 Windows Form 的自然變換轉譯向量 （100，0）。

trans-unit.source: Saves the graphics state of the form.
trans-unit.target: 儲存表單的圖形狀態。

trans-unit.source: Resets the world transform of the form to an identity and fills a rectangle with a solid red brush.
trans-unit.target: 重設為識別表單的自然變換和與實心的紅色筆刷填滿的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Restores the translated graphics state and fills a second rectangle with a solid blue brush.
trans-unit.target: 還原已轉換的圖形狀態，並使用實心藍色筆刷填滿第二個矩形。

trans-unit.source: The result is an untranslated red-filled rectangle and a translated blue-filled rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 結果是未轉譯的紅色填滿的矩形，翻譯的藍色填滿的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified rotation to the transformation matrix of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的旋轉套用至這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的變換矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Angle of rotation in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 旋轉的角度，以度為單位。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified rotation to the transformation matrix of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的旋轉套用至這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的變換矩陣。

trans-unit.source: The rotation operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a matrix whose elements are derived from the `angle` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 旋轉作業包括將其項目衍生自矩陣轉換矩陣乘以`angle`參數。

trans-unit.source: This method applies the rotation by prepending it to the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會套用旋轉附加在它前面的轉換矩陣。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Translates the world transformation matrix of the Windows Form by the vector (100, 0).
trans-unit.target: 將 Windows form 的自然變換矩陣轉換向量 （100，0）。

trans-unit.source: Rotates the world transformation by an angle of 30 degrees, prepending the rotation matrix to the world transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 旋轉的自然變換的角度 30 度，前面加上的自然變換矩陣的旋轉矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Draws a rotated, translated ellipse with a blue pen.
trans-unit.target: 旋轉、 轉換使用畫筆繪製橢圓形藍色。

trans-unit.source: Angle of rotation in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 旋轉的角度，以度為單位。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder" /> enumeration that specifies whether the rotation is appended or prepended to the matrix transformation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder" /> 列舉的成員，指定旋轉是附加到矩陣變換之前或之後。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified rotation to the transformation matrix of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: 依照指定的順序，將指定之旋轉套用至這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的變換矩陣。

trans-unit.source: The rotation operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a matrix whose elements are derived from the `angle` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 旋轉作業包括將其項目衍生自矩陣轉換矩陣乘以`angle`參數。

trans-unit.source: This method prepends or appends the transformation matrix of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> by the rotation matrix according to the `order` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會附加之前，或附加的變換矩陣<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>根據旋轉的矩陣`order`參數。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Translates the world transformation matrix of the Windows Form by the vector (100, 0).
trans-unit.target: 將 Windows form 的自然變換矩陣轉換向量 （100，0）。

trans-unit.source: Rotates the world transform by an angle of 30 degrees, appending the rotation matrix to the world transformation matrix with <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder.Append>.
trans-unit.target: 旋轉角度 30 度，若要使用的自然變換矩陣附加旋轉矩陣的自然變換<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder.Append>。

trans-unit.source: Draws a translated, rotated ellipse with a blue pen.
trans-unit.target: 翻譯、 旋轉使用畫筆繪製橢圓形藍色。

trans-unit.source: Saves the current state of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> and identifies the saved state with a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState" />.
trans-unit.target: 儲存這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的目前狀態，並使用 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState" /> 識別儲存的狀態。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState" /> that represents the saved state of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState" />，表示這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的儲存狀態。

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, an information block that holds the state of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is put on a stack.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>，保留狀態的資訊區塊<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>放在堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> that identifies that information block.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>可識別該資訊區塊。

trans-unit.source: When you pass the identifying <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to the state it was in at the time of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞時，用來識別<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>至<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>方法，資訊區塊會從堆疊移除，且用來還原<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>的時間當時的狀態<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> returned by a given call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method can be passed only once to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>給定呼叫所傳回的<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法可以一次傳遞至<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method can be nested; that is, you can call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method several times before you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法可以巢狀結構; 也就是說，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法多次，才能呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Each time you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> for the information block.
trans-unit.target: 每次呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法，一個資訊區塊會放在堆疊上，而且您收到<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>資訊區塊。

trans-unit.source: When you pass one of those objects to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is returned to the state it was in at the time of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call that returned that particular <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞時，這些物件的其中一個<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>方法，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>回復成的時間當時的狀態<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法呼叫傳回的特定<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>。

trans-unit.source: The information block placed on the stack by that <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call are also removed.
trans-unit.target: 資訊區塊放置在堆疊上的<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法呼叫會從堆疊移除，且之後的所有資訊區塊放都置於該堆疊上<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法呼叫也會移除。

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>相同呼叫堆疊上方法的位置資訊區塊<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Just as a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> call, a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: 就像<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>呼叫搭配<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>呼叫，<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法呼叫搭配<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法或由<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法) 之後的對應呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法會從堆疊移除。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，當您呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法或由<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法) 之後的對應呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>方法會從堆疊移除。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Translates the world transform of the Windows Form by a vector (100, 0).
trans-unit.target: 將 Windows Form 的自然變換轉譯向量 （100，0）。

trans-unit.source: Saves the graphics state of the form.
trans-unit.target: 儲存表單的圖形狀態。

trans-unit.source: Resets the world transform of the form to an identity (2x2 identity matrix plus a zero-vector translation) and fills a rectangle with a solid red brush.
trans-unit.target: 將表單的自然變換重設為 （2 x 2 單位矩陣，加上零向量轉換） 的身分識別，並使用實心的紅色筆刷填滿的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Restores the translated graphics state and fills a rectangle with a solid blue brush.
trans-unit.target: 還原已轉換的圖形狀態，並使用純色藍色筆刷填滿的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The result is an untranslated red-filled rectangle on the left and a translated blue-filled rectangle on the right of the form.
trans-unit.target: 結果是未轉譯紅色填滿的矩形在左邊，翻譯的藍色實心矩形，在表單的右側。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified scaling operation to the transformation matrix of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> by prepending it to the object's transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 透過將指定的縮放作業放置在物件的轉換矩陣之前，將作業套用至此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的轉換矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Scale factor in the x direction.
trans-unit.target: X 方向的縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: Scale factor in the y direction.
trans-unit.target: Y 方向的縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified scaling operation to the transformation matrix of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> by prepending it to the object's transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 透過將指定的縮放作業放置在物件的轉換矩陣之前，將作業套用至此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的轉換矩陣。

trans-unit.source: The scaling operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a diagonal matrix whose elements are (`sx`, `sy`, 1).
trans-unit.target: 調整作業包括將對角線矩陣，其元素也是轉換矩陣乘以 (`sx`， `sy`，1)。

trans-unit.source: This method prepends the transformation matrix of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> by the scaling matrix.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的前面加上的變換矩陣<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>由將縮放矩陣。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Rotates the world transformation matrix of the Windows Form by 30 degrees.
trans-unit.target: 30 度旋轉 Windows Form 的自然變換的矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Scales that matrix by a factor of 3 in the x direction and a factor of 1 in the y direction by prepending the scaling transformation.
trans-unit.target: 將該矩陣 x 方向的 3 倍和係數會是 1，在 y 方向縮放轉換附加在前面。

trans-unit.source: Draws a scaled, rotated rectangle with a blue pen.
trans-unit.target: 縮放、 旋轉使用畫筆繪製矩形藍色。

trans-unit.source: The result is still a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 結果仍是一個矩形。

trans-unit.source: Scale factor in the x direction.
trans-unit.target: X 方向的縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: Scale factor in the y direction.
trans-unit.target: Y 方向的縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: Member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder" /> enumeration that specifies whether the scaling operation is prepended or appended to the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder" /> 列舉的成員，指定縮放作業是附加到變換矩陣之前或之後。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified scaling operation to the transformation matrix of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: 依照指定的順序，將指定之縮放作業套用至這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的變換矩陣。

trans-unit.source: The scaling operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a diagonal matrix whose elements are (`sx`, `sy`, 1).
trans-unit.target: 調整作業包括將對角線矩陣，其元素也是轉換矩陣乘以 (`sx`， `sy`，1)。

trans-unit.source: This method prepends or appends the transformation matrix of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> by the scaling matrix according to the `order` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會附加之前，或附加的變換矩陣<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>所根據的縮放矩陣`order`參數。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Rotates the world transformation matrix of the Windows Form by 30 degrees.
trans-unit.target: 30 度旋轉 Windows Form 的自然變換的矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Scales that matrix by a factor of 3 in the x direction and a factor of 1 in the y direction by appending the scaling transformation with the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder.Append> member.
trans-unit.target: 藉由附加與縮放的轉換將該矩陣 x 方向的 3 倍和係數會是 1，在 y 方向<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder.Append>成員。

trans-unit.source: Draws a rotated, scaled rectangle with a blue pen.
trans-unit.target: 旋轉、 縮放使用畫筆繪製矩形藍色。

trans-unit.source: The result is a parallelogram.
trans-unit.target: 結果是平行四邊形。

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipping region of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to the <see langword="Clip" /> property of the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: 將這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的裁剪區域設定為所指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的 <see langword="Clip" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> that represents the new clip region.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" />，表示新的裁剪區域。

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipping region of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" />.
trans-unit.target: 將這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 之裁剪區域設定為指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" />。

trans-unit.source: If the graphics path represented by the `path` parameter is not closed, an additional segment is added from the last point to the first point to close the path.
trans-unit.target: 如果所代表的圖形路徑`path`參數未關閉，額外的區段加入的最後一個點来關閉路徑的第一個點。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a graphics path and adds an ellipse to the path.
trans-unit.target: 建立圖形路徑，並將橢圓形加入路徑。

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipping region to the elliptical path.
trans-unit.target: 將裁剪區域設定為橢圓形的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Fills a large rectangle with a solid black brush.
trans-unit.target: 填入實心黑色筆刷大的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The result is a filled, black ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 結果會填滿的黑色橢圓形。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> from which to take the new clip region.
trans-unit.target: 要從其中取得新裁剪區域的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipping region of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to the <see langword="Clip" /> property of the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: 將這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的裁剪區域設定為所指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的 <see langword="Clip" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a temporary <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> from the `thisForm`<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> of the example.

trans-unit.target: 設定 暫存的裁剪區域<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>小方形。

trans-unit.source: Updates the clipping region of the form's graphic object to that of the temporary <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>.

trans-unit.source: Fills a large rectangle with a solid black brush.

trans-unit.source: The result is a small, filled, black square.
trans-unit.target: 結果是小型、 填滿的黑色方塊。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that represents the new clip region.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 結構，表示新裁剪區域。

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipping region of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to the rectangle specified by a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipping region of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to the result of the specified operation combining the current clip region and the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />.
